Summary: Wonderful stay, excellent location, The room was peaceful, clean and had really comfortable beds. Make sure you take the Pacific Coast Highway while you're there. Newport Bay and Disney were both great!

If using as a time share, not equivalent to home base.  Units are not the same size and there are not kitchens or laundry in the units.  However location to the trolley was excellent. The staff was accomodating but due to Covid-the breakfast was lacking.  Not the fautt of the property

Summary Heading: Banned for no reason, returning customer
Summary: Stayed there a few times because of convince and the pool/jacuzzi. Booked another room, paid for it, and found out upon arrival that we were banned from the hotel. They wouldn’t disclose the reason, and I can’t think of a reason. I heard from friends that they do that all the time. Just horrible for business and rude to allow me to pay and then tell me upon arrival.

This is formerly a Best Western motel.  It is now at most a 2 star "motel".  Paying $269 exchange fee for a 3-day stay is a joke and a big rip off, not to mention you still have to pay with points!  Very disappointed.

Summary Heading: You must remember this: it's about proximity to the ocean
Summary: Family party of three. We wanted a not-overpriced inn in south Orange County near both the beach and the Interstate, and this fit the bill. We were alarmed at first about the tight parking quarters, but then were directed to a back lot with plenty of space. The only problem was that the gate to this back lot kept demagnetizing our room key cards. This was met with a cheerful shrug by the front desk staff. The room was comfortable. The "Casablanca" name is explained by a large mural of the timeless movie classic, and it's a superficial connection at best, but after all, the movie itself was an artful work of fiction filmed on a studio lot. The walk to the beach was easy, with a convenience store along the way. The neighborhood is a typical nondescript So Cal coastal stucco
Room tip: We had a nice ocean view from the bathroom window. Try to get an ocean view from at least one...

Summary Heading: Quick overnight stay with a friend
Summary: A friend and I spent one night at the Casablanca Inn as part of a quick surfing get away trip. We chose the Casablanca Inn mostly based on price and availability. Overall we had an OK stay, not bad but also not fabulous.  The photos online give this property a much more glamorous look than what it really is. It's a motel in decent shape and 5 minutes away by car / ride-share from the main restaurants / bar areas. The location is 5-10 minutes walk (depending on how fast you walk) to the beach. The check-in was easy and the staff pleasant. We got our room on time, away from the elevator and ice-machine. The room itself was pretty large, clean and the beds were comfortable but it definitely had a the feel of an older motel that you can tolerate for a night or two. The walls were

We weren't at the Casablanca Inn for long as we only stayed on night on the way from LAX to San Diego. So glad we stayed and then spent the next day in San Clemente. We were very late to arrive following delays from Storm Eunice but the night manager was excellent, explaining everything about the hotel and the room etc. He also pointed us to the bigger car park as I was a bit worried we had nowhere to park, there turned out to be loads of space.  The room was big and well equipped with some of the most comfortable beds I've ever found in a hotel. We were on the second floor near the vending machine and ice machine which did make for an early wake up call the next morning but we all had jet lag anyway so we were already up and about.  Breakfast (complimentary) was great, the kids

I chose Casablanca Inn solely because of the great reviews I read online. I rarely get to take days off and I wanted to relax without traveling too far from where I live. Casablanca Inn reviews were great so I thought this place could be perfect to spend overnight to relax. Check in went wonderful. The front desk clerk was very nice. He even stood up and showed me around, I was very appreciative. My room was 1st floor, right off parking lot (window away), and no view, nothing like I saw from the website photos. There are microwave, mini refrigerator, and even mini kitchen sink, which was wonderful. Also I found out the bathtub was one of those “jet” equipped big tubs! I was very happy. Room was old but clean. I saw “coffee available in front desk” from website (I thought….) but
Room tip: Ask for the room with working Heater

Summary: Great location (less than a mile from Pizza Port), free WiFi, simple breakfast options included (breakfast burrito, waffle, toast with avocado spread), and spacious rooms. Decor is a bit dated, but not a deal breaker.

Summary Heading: Quaint little getaway that's near the San Clemente Train Station
Summary: I would stay here for the nearby beach (2 blocks away) and shopping at the beautiful San Clemente Outlets.  The Tesla Superchargers at the outlet was very convenient.  The hotel itself is old but well maintained. We stayed for 3 nights for the Thanksgiving weekend. We stayed at room 313 on the 3rd floor for the building directly above the covered parking area + driveway near the lobby.  Since it's pandemic, the daily free breakfast is limited to freshmade waffles, fruits, coffee, tea, toast, and microwave burritos and muffins from Costco. I skipped the syrup for the waffle because of High Fructose corn syrup (it's just me).  Free parking onsite. One thing I noticed was the tight on-site parking situation as it could only accommodate small cars. Despite the sign indicating

Summary Heading: A Short Stay Near the Beach
Summary: Older place, room was clean and quiet.  Does not at all look like the photos so perhaps they gave us a room that had not been updated yet.  Courtyard and pool areas were nice and it was close to the beach.  This stop was part of a longer trip up California coast so we stayed one night only. Parking was included and the sunset was free!

Older facility but very pleasant. Nice courtyard with fountain, tables and chairs to enjoyed free breakfast. Walking distance to beach trail and free shuttle to shopping outlets and San Clemente Pier.

This place was a cave. If that's your thing, book it because the room itself was clean and is in a pretty good location. Normally I don't write reviews unless something stands out lack of value is what strikes me. Too expensive to live next to dragons and stuff.

Summary Heading: Great staff, great pool, great location
Summary: Great staff:  with the new changes the new General Manager Brandon seems quite pleasant and professional.  With all the changes in all of our lives, it was particularly great to see staff member from the past!   William  "Will" who is the Operations Manager has always been a delight to work with in our many years of staying at Casablanca!  A great pool for all but particularly so for us lap swimmers and having a hot tub is unusually pleasant these days.   The great location, well it speaks for itself.    Rooms in the newer building just now needing a bit of work, but large, easy to feel at home in.  Plus the tubs are fantastic.  We will look forward to seeing how the future remodel looks.  Cheers to your stay,

Summary Heading: Good price, clean and close to the beach
Summary: Hotel was a good value especially for how close it is to the beaches. It’s hard to find a decent place for under 200 these days. Rooms were clean, nothing fancy. Had a cool little courtyard to eat the breakfast in. The pool was clean. Would definitely recommend this hotel. Eat at the Schwack!

The carpet was really filthy and smelled.  I had to keep the door open to get a fresh air every day.  Exterior were not kept clean.  Parking situations can be very difficult if you arrive late.  Ice machine was also filthy dirty and never seen the housekeeping dept never checks the area even the storage for housekeeping supplies are right next to it.  The mattress is very soft so you prefer a firm bed, prepare for a back aches

They have cleaned this place up.  The staff is very friendly and local so can give you great tips.  I grew up in San Clemente so have watched this place turn around.  The pool is small but clean.  They parking is tight in the covered area but they have the lot behind the hotel and it suite you just fine, especial if you get a room on the west side.  Great location walking distance from North Beach and the Tram station, close to the highway, and close to some shops.  A quick drive to San Clemente 'downtown' and the pier.  Fisherman's Restaurant is our go to place for chowder and Poke, although their prices have popped up.  Pet policy is reasonable and the rooms are 'roomy' enough for crates.  Only one ice machine which is a hunt to find. Security...good thing it is San Clement

Thanks for a great stay. This property is clean, has great customer service, great breakfast options, walking distance to the beach (there is a parking lot close as well for the beach if you have a lot to carry) free parking at hotel, our room was amazing, and the pool area was fantastic! Thanks again for a great getaway, we will definitely be back

Summary Heading: A short stay in San Clemente
Summary: If you want to be close, but not too close to San Clemente pier and Downtown, this is the place to stay.  The place is eclectic and you are close to unexpected hard to find excellent Colombian restaurant, La Colombiana.

We stayed here based one the strength of reviews here on TA.  However, I didn’t experience the same level of fondness for the property.  The staff was great; friendly and accommodating.   The hotel is in a great location and the rooms are clean.   However, this is more a motel than an Inn - the decorations are cheap - carpet, TVs, artwork.   The worst part was the lighting, right outside the front door, under the only window was a very bright light that couldn’t be turned off. That made it feel like a correctional facility.   Also, we wanted to enjoy the pool, but it was ice cold.    The place is reasonably priced for the location, but not what we were looking for.

Summary Heading: Relatively cheap place in not the most upscale of neighborhoods
Summary: Got the king spa room up on the third floor with balcony.  Balcony has solid wall so only can see over.  Can't see anywhere but up if seated in the sparse furniture.  Room seems large because it only has a desk, drawer, frig holding piece of furniture, a bed, a desk, and a hide a bed.  No separate lounge chair or other seating.  All a bit worse for wear.  Breakfast during Covid is nothing to write home about.  Suspect you can do better elsewhere in town.

Jacob, who helped us with check in was outstanding.  He walked us to the property and explained where everything was located.  The lady that handed out the breakfast items was very nice and helpful.  It is situated well within various areas of interest including the San Clemente Outlets.  Numerous places to eat close by.  My only complaint would be that the walls are thin.  I could hear my neighbor having a great time next door.

Summary Heading: Be warned of extremely old rooms and your need to pay extra to upgrade.
Summary: Don't expect even upgraded room to be special, just adequate.   Nice staff though.  Pool area is nice.  Outdoor jacuzzi was a nice thing to enjoy too.  Towels and extra blankets need to be replaced.... very worn

This was just a short get away trip.  The front desk clerk (I think his name was Jason) was very welcoming and helpful.  The rooms are just a typical hotel room, but the comfortable mattress really makes the room. I slept great!  The woman who runs the breakfast room is very friendly & loves her job.

would return again and letting my friends and family know about this hotel. very close to beach shops and restaurants . service great. room very clean. and we felt very comfortable. Also pool and sauna were open and very clean. we were very happy and pleased with our visit and plan to go back and stay longer with our friends and family. And our doggies this hotel is dog friendly. Also enjoyed the patio area. ate there for breakfast. Excellent Hotel Excellent Service. Good Price.

Summary Heading: Great location with a great staff
Summary: The team was very good! Unfortunately they have some obstacles with the property that are not probably within the scope of work they do. I am a very frequent traveler and unfortunately this is one of the few times I have had to say some negatives about a property. The location is awesome and with some improvements it could be a much nicer experience. Be careful about choosing a room that is on the street as it is very noisy.

Summary Heading: Fantastic quiet clean well maintained hotel
Summary: Loved my stay here. The staff make you feel like family extra helpful and super friendly. The location is close walk or bike to beach with French cafe Moulin  on the way with fresh coffee and pastry or sandwich’s. The pool area has a hot tub bbq grill water toys for the kids umbrellas and lovely grounds with skyline views. The rooms are very clean with no strange smells pet friendly and fresh air friendly. The courtyard patio has a tranquil water fountain and flowers 🌺 very nice and clean,  LOVED THIS  PET FRIENDLY HOTEL  There is a walking bike path along the beach with parks that takes you to the pier nearby very nice. Columbian restaurant across the street great food. Highly recommend this hotel, can’t wait to come back

It’s a charming hotel with a wonderful pool and jacuzzi (worth a 4 star hotel). Lovely fountain and walkable distance to great restaurants and a French Bakery called Moulin.  The staff is very friendly and helpful. Always reachable even late at night.  The rooms are a bit outdated but its a price and location gem.  We have been coming for the last past 10 years once or twice to fully relax and swim.  Go for Sunset at the pier, and enjoy your stay. San Clemente is a little paradise.

Summary Heading: Everything perfect, but coffee still sucks
Summary: Basic room, you are a 13 min walk from the beach but when its high tide, no beach.  Just enough soaps and shampoos so you don't smell like "Travel Funk". the beds are comfortable but the air conditioner is super noisy. Just open the window and get that fresh air.  I really wish they would do something about that coffee.. Im sure you can partner up with a local roaster.

We have stayed here many times in the past but this is the first time we have brought our dog. We arrived super early but William was gracious, said our room was available and let us check in early. No questions about  Sugar's shot records or anything  - unlike our last stay in San Diego. No room service because of covid19 but fresh towels were available daily. All the staff here is amazing, always friendly and more than willing to help as needed!!!!! Rooms are well appointed,comfortable, and user friendly. Our go to place in San Clemente

The young man working the front desk did a great job. neat location and pet friendly. Room was clean and was a great price. It was perfect for a quick one nighter travelling. We would stay there again.

Summary Heading: Motel room, not resert-like or suite.
Summary: This motel room was a disappointment compared to usual RCI exchanges.  Small, dingy, tired-looking, dated.  Our exchange also did not include housekeeping so we had to go ask frequently for towels and toilet paper, etc.  We were placed on third floor and where is seemed all the smokers were, even though they smoked outside the room.  The stairs were outside and hazardous in the rain, and elevator was broke on day we were leaving.  I would suggest to others to get a hotel nearer downtown and the pier.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We apologize that we did not meet your expectations.  Best Western properties are not the same as the resort properties owned by RCI.  RCI negotiates on your behalf to be able to offer you the lowest possible price in areas they do not have resorts.  We do offer other advantages however, including a free hot breakfast, free parking & wifi as well as other amenities not offered with time shares.  We are very sorry our elevator was out of service, unfortunately this was beyond our control and we had the elevator serviced and running a few hours later.  We want to thank you for staying with us and we hope your next experience at a Best Western Hotel is a positive one.

Summary: I have been a repeat guest of this Inn for many years,....I keep coming back for many reasons....The kind hospitality starting at check in until you check out....how fresh and clean the rooms are with all of the amenities one needs...outstanding Maid Service....the warmth of how you are treated by the Front desk...making your stay as comfortable as possible...the sound of the Water fountain in front..creating such a nice ambiance...the huge swimming pool where they actually have a B.B.Que you are welcome to use..and of course the complimentary breakfast in the morning....there's a very nice woman who works the breakfast room whom is full of kind hospitality..I highly recommend this amazing Hotel.....you do not even have to drive..there are so many restaurants within walking
Manager Response: Dear Debbie, Thank you very much for your wonderful review of our property, and we want to thank you for being a loyal customer to both our hotel & Best Western.  Many travelers will benefit from your thorough review of our property, and we cannot thank you enough!  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Our sincerest thanks for your review!

Summary: This hotel is located in the heart of San Clemente and offered us a wonderful stay!  The staff was super friendly from the beginning to the end. The rooms very clean and spacious. The complementary breakfast was an absolute delicious surprise and I might say, we slept in the most comfortable bed! We wouldn't hesitate to stay there again, we all loved it!
Manager Response: Dear Janine, Thank you so much for the great review of our property!  We are delighted you enjoyed the hot breakfast buffet, and our new beds!  We really appreciate your business and we look forward to welcoming you the next time your travel plans bring you to San Clemente.

Summary: The hotel is located perfectly, just a few blocks from the ocean and only a couple miles from the pier in San Clemente.  The staff is amazing and provided the most outstanding customer service we have ever received at a hotel.  Rooms are clean and spacious.  The only knock would be the way the parking lot is set up, but hey, you stay for the room not the parking.  The breakfast was awesome and fresh daily.
Manager Response: Thank You Larry, for the wonderful review.  We are delighted you had a great time while staying with us.  We agree the parking is tight, but space is always at a premium around the beaches.  We want to thank you for staying with us, and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Only a mile or so from the pier and old town San Clemente, close to many other facilities.  Nicely maintained hotel with clean and very comfortable room.  Breakfast was average, but then it is free so I have no complain.  What make is exceptional is the breakfast lady who is very friendly and helpful.  Definitely will be back and highly recommended this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you Christianita, We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us.  We are so pleased our staff represented our hotel well, and were helpful to you and your family.  We really appreciate the kind words about our property in your review.  Thank you for staying with us, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Nice hotel close to everything San Clemente offers to a tourist. Great price for the area. It’s more about location and a place to rest before you head out on the town. Definitely great if your on a budget.
Manager Response: Thank you Marco for your review of our property.  We really appreciate that you took the time to let others know about our hotel & your experience with us.  Now is the best time to travel to our area as the rates are the lowest of the year, and the weather is still very nice.  We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Fantastic place to hang your hat while enjoying scenic San Clemente. You are only a short walk to great restaurants, a bike rental, and the Metrolink. The breakfast was pretty basic but tasty. I recommend one of the rooms with a private balcony.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We want to thank you for the excellent rating.  We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us.  San Clemente is a beautiful city, we couldn't agree more.  We hope to see you in the summer time, San Clemente has a free shuttle service that runs from Memorial weekend until October 1st.  This connects with the free shuttles in Dana Point & Laguna Beach as well.  Thank you again for your wonderful review.

Summary Heading: Very nice Hotel, close to beach!
Summary: My family really enjoyed our stay here.  Premises were clean and very nice.  Staff very friendly and helpful.  Would stay here again for sure!  Breakfast great as well!  We loved the courtyard to hang out.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for the awesome review of our property, we are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to see you again in the future, and wish you a happy new year!

Summary: It is located close to the highway with easy access. Facilities are clean and front desk staff is kind. It offers a good sleep. Evenings you have to drive for food and markets as there are very limited options. Famoıus St.Clemente pier is 5-10 minutes drive. Parking is sufficient. Breakfast has limited choices.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for reviewing our property, we are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to see you again!

Summary: I been in this hotel during Christmas holidays and that was an awesome experience. The rooms were clean, the staff were so nice and more important, the breakfast was the best. They have enough parking space. Also, you have to walk just about 5 minute to get to the beach. I used their laundry and that was clean as well.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for the 5 star review.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  We want to personally thank you for taking the time to review our property so that other travelers are informed about our amenities.  Have a happy new year!

Summary: Great place to stay for business or leisure only hotel I will stay at in San Clemente nice staff great location clean rooms you can actually smell the detergent which shows they actually wash their linen I have stayed at other best westerns but this one has be the best this far!
Manager Response: Thank You very much for your kink words & 5 star review.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us, and we look forward to your next visit.  Have a happy & prosperous new year!

Summary: Front desk staff were nice, room was ok except there's a batting cage directly behind it. Open the bathroom window and it's right there below the window. Aluminum bats hitting a baseball make a lot of noise, a few of them make a lot more noise. And don't leave anything valuable in the room when you check out; my experience was that it's not returned. Some housekeeper now has a valuable piece of electronic equipment (and I'm absolutely sure that I left it on the nightstand shelf and yes I've checked my luggage and contents a few times). One more thing: if you use the quick checkout and they tell you that they'll email the receipt to you expect to have to make a couple phone calls and argue with staff and insist on talking to a manager. Then, miraculously they are able to send the
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We are very sorry to hear about your lost electronics item.  We highly suggest you log into the place where you bought the item (if amazon log into your account and try to use the app to locate your lost item).  Although the housekeeper who cleaned your room did not locate the item, the room you were checked into was occupied the night you checked out by another guest.  Our housekeepers do turn everything into us, but must have missed this item.  We have a couple of Kindles, and other phones/tablets in our lost and found, but nothing recently was turned in.  We will keep our eye out for it and if found we will let you know.

Summary Heading: Great location and excellent amenities for a great price
Summary: The wedding party for my son's wedding stayed here for the weekend. The amenities were great and we had no complaints with anyone in the party. The breakfast bar was excellent and had a good variety of options for everyone's tastes. The rooms were very clean and organized and they were pet friendly so we brought along our two small dogs so that they would not be left alone. Overall a great experience.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for the excellent review. We appreciate you letting other travelers know the details of your experience with us.  We hope you had a great time at the wedding, and we look forward to welcoming you the next time your plans bring you to San Clemente.

Summary: We stayed at this Best Western location from November 14 to 16, 2019. My wife had a teacher’s conference to attend in San Clemente so she brought our two dogs and I along with her.   The room was very clean and up-to-date with LED lightbulbs and a modern flat-screen LCD TV.   Our stay also included a continental breakfast that also featured bacon, sausage patties, and scrambled eggs. They also had a Belgian waffle maker with a nice selection of syrups and fruit preserves.  The employees serving the food were also very friendly.   The main reason I am knocking one star on my review is because the sound insulation was very subpar in the room we stayed in (Room 215). We could hear cats and trucks pass by at various times of the day/night. In addition to the outside noises, we were
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We want to thank you for taking the time to review our property.  We will look into the insulation around the door & try to find out why road noise is leaking into the room.  We are very happy that you enjoyed the breakfast & the comfort of the room.  We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Very friendly hotel in a nice seaside town
Summary: Stayed 3 nights(14/15/16 November) in a king bedroom. Good sized room, clean and the bed was comfortable. Excellent shower and the breakfast was good. The staff were extremely friendly and gave the hotel a relaxed atmosphere.  Would definitely stay again.  Strongly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank You Graham for the wonderful review.  We recently updated our beds, and it appears they are a quite a hit. We appreciate you staying with us, and we are very happy you enjoyed the services the hotel provides including the hot breakfast buffet.  We look forward to welcoming you the next time your plans bring you to San Clemente.

Summary: We spent two nights I’m this property , externally the property is reasonably presented with a large car offering free parking . The checkin was friendly and efficiently dealt with as was the checkout . The room on the third floor was a  standard king size for this category of hotel and was delivered in a clean condition as was the bathroom . Towels toiletries and  linen were everyday ordinary quality. Water pressure  is average but sleep quality was excellent . There is a complimentary breakfast which again is standard   offering  a range of packaged  processed foods and various cakes and freeze dried  ehh s which  are heated prior to serving  ( very unhealthy) in my opinion.In short  I spend six to eight months travelling  the world and am fortunate to usually stay in five
Manager Response: Dear Martin, Thank you for taking the time to review our property.  I know we are not a 5 star hotel, but we are pleased our staff and hotel suited your needs on your trip to San Clemente.  We hope you will consider us on your next stay in our area.

Summary Heading: Clean, beds very comfortable and free parking.
Summary: Stayed 3 nights here visiting friends before on to LA port for cruise.  Good location with  Lots of shops and great food within driving distance.  Hotel was clean and beds were very comfortable.  Staff was excellent and daily breakfast included hot and cold items.  Free parking was a plus.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We recently upgraded our beds, and it appears they are a big success.  Thank you for letting other travelers know about your experience with us, we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I was visiting so the location was great for me. Everyone that worked there were friendly & willing to help with any of your needs. Since I was able to use my timeshare at this hotel I do not have housekeeping but they still provided clean towels when needed
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel.  We know you had many options when choosing a hotel to stay at instead of your timeshare, and we are very pleased our facilities met your needs.  Thank you for the 4 star review and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: The reason it gets a 3 is the location. Lots of shops around and mins from the beach. Not too far of a drive to Disney either. Bring your own pillows. The bed is the main reason for the 3 stars. Didnt get a single night of good sleep.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to review our property, we had upgraded a majority of our beds last year, but still have a few that needs to be changed, we are very sorry your sleep quality was not up to standards, but we should complete the last few rooms needing beds by the beginning of the year.  We hope you will come back and see us and notice a big change in the comfort of the beds.

Summary: This Best Western property in San Clemente really took care of me after my car broke down on the freeway not far from the hotel's location.  The staff was excellent and understanding and they met all of my requests.  The morning breakfast was very good and the staff there was helpful.  I would highly recommend this property if you are visiting the San Clemente area and you need a place to stay.  Great job BW staff!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We are so pleased our staff did an excellent job during your stay.  I know having problems with your car can ruin your day, but the bright side, is you had a nice mini vacation & a hearty breakfast the next day.  We hope you will consider staying again with us for a longer vacation.

Summary Heading: Wonderful place for a 3 day stay
Summary: Phoned before hand and asked for a quiet room and early check in. Both requests were done. The front desk staff was friendly and helpful. One of the cleanest hotels I stayed in. Loved that the cleaners were friendly and worked so hard. Loved the picnic area around the fountain. Pool was clean and welcoming. Bathroom at pool spotless. Room beds super comfortable. Everything in room newish, art on walls beautiful local scenes. Fridge, TV, coffee maker all worked great.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Wow what a great review of our property, we want to personally thank you for taking the time to say such nice things about our hotel!  We will continue to provide excellent service the next time your plans bring you to our area.

Summary: One happy camper. Will definitely come back to this location. The hotel staff was extremely hospitable. Planning to make a vacation in the summer at this location with my grandchildren and sons and daughters
Manager Response: Hello Happy Camper, We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us.  If you are staying this summer we suggest booking as soon as possible.  Right now we have opened up some nice discounts for travelers staying over 3 nights.  Typically we do not open these discounts on the weekends, so hurry up and book while they are still available.   We look forward to seeing you again this summer!

Summary: The people that work here whether it be the maids or the manager are all happy helpful and wonderful people.  I went on a festival weekend so I just had the badd luck of being placed underneath the noisiest people that decided to party all night long but the staff was great.
Manager Response: Thank You Jennifer,  Our staff will love your review, and I will make sure they see it.  Travelers such as yourself helps encourage us to keep up our good work.  Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary Heading: A Great End To A Holiday In California and Arizona
Summary: My wife and I stayed at this hotel for three nights at the end of a 20-day holiday in California and Arizona.  The hotel has a Spanish-style design and is pleasantly different to many of the modern 'boxes' we stayed in. There are plenty of parking places. The staff were all very helpful and friendly, giving sound advice on where to visit in San Clemente and how to get back to LA Airport.   The room was clean and tidy, with a fridge and microwave. It had lovely balconey overlooking a central courtyard with a fountain. Breakfast was tasty and substantial, being overseen by a member of staff who ensured everything  was well stocked. She also prepares great waffles!  It is a short walk to the beach, but the free trolley bus that stops outside the hotel was particulary useful, as it

The Casablanca Inn met all our needs.  Stayed two nights and it was comfortable, quiet and clean.  It's an older hotel but our room was updated with quartz countertop in the bathroom, new looking carpet, fresh looking wallpaper and paint, updated decor.  Bed was pretty comfortable, shower was good and BW breakfast was the usual with tasty waffles and very good coffee.  The woman in charge made the waffles for us which was a nice touch. Booked through AAA and got an excellent rate and we received a free upgrade to a room with a balcony.  Area is quiet, away from freeway and close to beach and shopping.  We were very pleased with our stay.  If you want to spend more there are newer places, but this hotel met our needs for a quick getaway without breaking the bank on a hotel room.

I stayed here because it was close to a wedding that I attended. The staff were helpful and nice. The building is old and needs some upgrades. Our first few nights were in one room and then we switched. The second room was much better,
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our property.  We are constantly making changes and updating our guest rooms and our properties exterior.  We are very pleased you found a room that suited you and that our staff was attentive to your needs.  We hope you will consider staying with us in the future, and we really appreciate that you stayed with us while attending a wedding.

Summary: I came here for my birthday with my husband. When I informed them of my birthday they gave me a discount offered me a SPA and made me feel special. I felt appreciated and heard. The room was clean and loved the non smoking atmosphere.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that our efforts made you feel welcome while visiting with us.  We want all of our guests to feel this way, and knowing in advance gives us an opportunity to do so.  Thank you so much for spending this special occasion with us, and for giving us a 5 star review.  We look forward to the next time your travels bring you to San Clemente.

Summary: We always stay at this hotel when coming to San Clemente where our kids live. Entire facility is immaculate, beds are soft and so are the pillows. Good breakfast, centrally located, easy walk to three great restaurants (well, two great restaurants and great noodle shop). Also easy walk to the beach and a really great full service car wash.
Manager Response: Thank You for the 5 star review, we just purchased our mattresses this year and are super happy you are enjoying them.  We know there are many choices out there and we really appreciate you choosing us when you come to visit with your family.

Summary: Dark, dreary rooms, inadequate furniture, lacking outdoor seating and space to enjoy beautiful SoCal. Very disappointing. Poor value for the high number of points charged. Do not recommend. They tried to give us a room with a leaking/dripping a/c unit. Not modern or upscale in any way.
Manager Response: Dear Pamela, We are very sorry you did not enjoy your room.  We do have some rooms with outdoor patios, but unfortunately that was not the room type you had booked.  We do our best to provide photos of our rooms and facilities so our guests are aware of their accommodations.  We do have a nice courtyard that was directly outside your room, with tables & chairs for you to enjoy the outside.  We are very sorry the room did not meet your standards, and if you decide to stay with us again please let us know and we will be happy to upgrade you to one of our rooms with private balconies.

Summary: This hotel had the perfect location for us! We were looking for a nice hotel with a pool that had access to the SC trolley so we could go downtown. The stop was right outside our hotel, perfect location! The pool and spa area was lovely and relaxing. Our room was nice and kept cool all day. The sink water did sometimes smell like ocean water but had no taste of salt so might have just been from others leaving their beach stuff inside. The staff was inviting and sociable, we had a great check in with Jacob, the breakfast manager was friendly and restocking everything for us (wish we had got her name!), and a quick and easy check out with Kalani. Absolutely would come back and stay here.
Manager Response: Hi Bethany, Thank you so much for the 5 star review! We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I will make sure Jacob reads your review as well.  We hope to see you again, thank you again for posting such a nice & thorough review of our property & area.

Summary: This hotel has a free trolley stop just outside of the building. It is very convenient to access transportation and all of the fun things that San Clemente has to offer. We thought our rooms were very clean and were decent sized. The pool area was nice, although they were out of pool towels almost every time we went swimming. There is a free breakfast offered each morning, which is adequate. The breakfast room is very tiny and not realistically sized for this hotel. Get there early if you want a seat or just take your plate back up to your room. Parking is free and there are plenty of spaces between the garage and outdoor lot. We had good service at the front desk. The housekeeping team was fantastic and very friendly. We didn’t have to spend an arm and a leg for our

The hotel is conveniently located to everything in San Clemente, Dana Point, the coast.  City trolley service easy to use, free, trolley stop right by hotel--thanks to hotel staff telling us about this transportation.  Staff all helpful and friendly.  Enjoyed the pool.  We would stay Again.  For our taste the beds could be a little softer, but that's just a preference thing.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the nice review.  Most of our beds are brand new and probably need a little time to soften.  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: This property is conveniently located and is a good value for a beach town.  They have a nice pool too.  We also appreciate that breakfast is included.  The free trolley stops right out front and will take you to the pier or to the outlet mall.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, we are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  The trolley is a great service, and now you can use the free trolley service to travel all the way to Laguna Beach and back.  This service is available to all guests from Memorial Day until the end of September and the times are weekdays noon to 9pm and weekends 10am to 10pm.

Summary Heading: Good size room and good location
Summary: We stayed here for four nights on the penultimate leg of a three week road trip around California. The room was huge with a kitchenette and a spa bathtub and shower.   There were tea and coffee facilities both in the room and in reception. And cold water in reception as well, useful for topping up water bottles.   Breakfast was the standard fare we had experienced along the way; waffles, scrambled eggs, pastries, toast, bagels, juice and coffee. Nothing wrong with it, we were just a bit bored with the same stuff. One good thing about this breakfast bar was the helpful and cheerful server who kept things moving. The breakfast room itself was small and a little bit depressing but adequate.   One downside of our room (227) was that it had a connecting door to two other rooms and we
Manager Response: Thank You so much for your detailed review of the property & the area.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us and had a chance to explore the area.  We hope the rest of your trip was just as nice.  We hope to see you again!

Summary: Was there for a family wedding, this is a beach town and the hotel was older but updated.  My family chose this because it was close to the venue for the wedding, actually walkable.  This made its location very helpful.  We all stayed two nights and it was adequate for our needs.

Summary Heading: Casablanca Inn dog friendly in great location!
Summary: We were pleasantly surprised to pull into the BW Plus Casablanca Inn. The reason we chose this Best Western was mainly due to location and being a dog friendly hotel. I was expecting dog smells in the room but there was none, just clean and fresh. The beds were comfortable, the pool and spa were sparkling clean and the breakfast was good. The choices were freshly made waffles by a nice lady with hot breakfast meats and scrambled eggs with fruit and breads. The hotel was within walking distance to many unique restaurants. We tried the Columbian restaurant across the street and it was fantastic. The beach was only a less than a miles stroll. We will definitely be coming back to the Casablanca Inn in San Clemente.

Summary Heading: Great location, great room, great service
Summary: Great location, great room, great service, great breakfast. We always enjoy this hotel and it’s location, it’s close to the beach, it’s closento shopping at the outlets and it’s close to downtown also. We love it here!

We had a lovely stay, room clean and comfortable, really nice complementary breakfast. Staff were nice and very helpful. I’d recommend staying here. We didn’t use the pool but it looked nice. Parking is quite tight but we managed.

Very nice BW+ Hotel in San Clemente. Walking distance to beach and train station. Pico Park and the trails on the bluffs also in walking distance. An easy drive to Dana Point Harbor that has great eateries. What makes the Casablanca Inn worth the stay and extra special are the 2 guys that work the front desk, so friendly and informative !! They deserve a raise!!! We were given one of the newer rooms that had a jacuzzi tub and a king size bed--the room was enormous!! Stayed here for a quick getaway for our anniversary. It was well worth the 30 minute drive!

You are fore warned. This is a pet friendly motel. If you are allergic to animals, make sure you ask for a non-pet friendly room. Make them aware of your allergies. RCI paperwork said that this was a "No Pets Allowed" vacation place. It also does not have a kitchen or kitchenette, so don't plan to cook there. They do have a very nice salt water pool. The ocean is a couple miles away. You can't see the ocean from the motel, but the motel is located in a very quiet area. No freeway noise. San Clemente is a nice clean city. Easy to get around. The staff were very friendly and helpful.

Outstanding front desk people.  Very Clean room, Excellent Breakfast Pool very clean, Court yard was comfortable and clean. Manager was very helpful when my car broke down. He knew right where to send us.

This was a very clean hotel, close to San Juan Capistrano as well as Dana Point and only a 5 minute walk to the beach.  Check in was easy and staff members very friendly and provided recommendations when asked.  Our room was on the second floor and was extremely neat and clean with a little view of the ocean and sunsets (weather permitting).  Though I loved this room itself, I would request NOT to have a room on the main street, should I return.  The little view does not make up for the amount of street noise (people and cars).  Bed was very comfortable and I have nothing but praise for our room otherwise.  Internet as terrible.  Though I connected at times, it was very patchy and I just shut my computer down and resorted to my phone for info I needed. You are within walking

Summary Heading: Best Western Casablanca Inn is a hidden gem!
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights and had a wonderful time, we even extended our trip because we didn't want to leave.  With two kids aged 5 & 7 I was worried that it might be claustrophobic but this hotel has a lovely open feel with a quiet courtyard in the centre and a fabulous salt water swimming pool that was sparkling clean.  The pool was a huge hit and we went every day.  It was a lot cleaner than most other pools in hotels and was very private, barely overlooked.  I was so impressed with this stay that I will be searching for similar Best Western Hotels for our next trip.  I hope I can find them!

We loved the location of this hotel in the heart of San Clemente. The property was clean and the staff was friendly. Full breakfast was offered however the dining area was very small. Decor was dated.

Nice stay again. Been here 5 to 10 times over the last 20 years or so. Our favorite reasonably priced hotel in San Clemente. You can pay more at some right on the beach but if wanting a regular priced hotel this one is hard to beat. The upstairs rooms with balcony overlooking the fountain area are real nice. North beach is within walking distance along with a food and a liquor store across the street. Service is top notch and the rooms are nice and clean. Another nice stay.

All things went well had no problems at all from extra towels to friendly service. Being on the road alot I do not often get time to relax. there was a patio of which was semiprivate. A slight bummer but to be able and enjoy the weather was nice.

This is a very comfortable motel in a good location in San Clemente.  Stayed here for one week and the staff are friendly, as an example, they will bring extra towels to your room if you request. Good location, walking distance to beach

This hotel was not the fanciest I’ve stayed at but had a certain charm. We felt the hotel needed updating, but was nonetheless a comfortable stay for our family with kids. Beds were comfortable. The on-site breakfast room was handy. The staff were friendly and helpful. Loved the beautiful pool and hot tub (great salt water pool).  Seemed a bit steep of a price, but maybe that’s the going rate in San Clemente. Would consider staying there again.

Although the rooms are pleasant and the staff friendly, especially the breakfast staff, I found it very difficult to sleep with all the noise from the rooms next door and above. Obviously the insulation between rooms is poor and not only could I hear TV's, Air conditioners reeving up but also voices and heavy foot falls. Yes - even happy sex noises from the room above us.  Very disappointing to be on holiday and be sleep deprived.

Staff very courteous and friendly.  They catered to our every need.  The business room needs to be upgraded.  They need a printer that woks on WiFi and perhaps updating the computers to ones that work with the printer.  The asst manager allowed me to purchase my return on Amtrak using the office stuff.  The gal Angel in the coffee shop is an asset.  Good location for visiting this area.

We love to go to Oceanside and Carlsbad for beach getaways, so in December we thought we would go and checkout San Clemente, to see if we want to add it to our list for this summer. We checked in early, and had a room on the second floor with a nice balcony overlooking the courtyard. The beach is in walking distance, and we also walked down the front to the pier. Breakfast is included, usual choices, looks like very limited seating, it was not a problem for us, however it must be sometimes when they are full. A very nice lady working in the breakfast area (sorry we did not get her name) super helpful. Hotel looks a little old, but it was fine. Free parking, and a very nice outlet/mall close by. All in all a good stay, not the Ritz of course but fine. We would recommend it.

We are always happy to stay at this hotel, beautiful setting, perfect area to enjoy. This hotel is always quiet and well ran. This time we needed an early check in and they did their best to get things ready for us.

Summary Heading: The nicest beds and blankets I have ever found in a hotel.
Summary: Rooms were a good size had a private balcony overlooking fountain and courtyard.   Ideal location - close to beach etc but not a heavy tourist location.  Quite cozy and compfortable with good food nearby and a great reception hall nearby - we had a wedding to attend there.  Very special little area to be located in.

I really liked this hotel. Great location. Lots of parking. Great staff (thank you Jacob). Great size room with awesome balcony overlooking the fountain terrace area. Great mattress. Great heat/AC unit. Breakfast was awesome, great selection and nice private secure room to eat in. Oh and it's just a short walk to the beach!  The only thing I would say that I noticed needed attention was the hook on the back of the bathroom door. It was falling off.

Wonderful place to stay in San Clemente, CA.  The location is awesome and the staff are great.  The room was exceptionally clean and quiet.  Breakfast is always delicious as well.  I have stayed here before, and I will definitely be back!

Summary Heading: Good choice for exploring San Clemente
Summary: Stayed for 2 nights and thoroughly enjoyed our visit. Reception staff were cheerful on arrival and room was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was quite good and did try the waffles which were great. Breakfast room a bit small and could get busy.  Location is good especially with the free trolley service from right outside. All the way to the pier one way or the mall the other.

Stopped here on way down to San Diego after flying into LAX. What a gem of a town exactly hallway between LA and San Diego. Hotel staff were very welcoming, not bad for a 1am arrival. Room was great with two queen beds. Nice free breakfast. Best part of location is 5 minute walk down to beach in morning. Enjoy!!
Manager Response: Thank You for the Great review, we really appreciate the 5 stars!!!. We are happy you enjoyed our beautiful city, and we look forward to your return visit.

Summary: Nice quiet hotel so quiet it was like a ghost town! Breakfast was nice and the sweet lady who offered to make my waffles 2 days in a row bless her heart..  No complaints would stay again  This time i hope it is not raining so we could use the pool
Manager Response: Thank you Josephine for your 5 Star review!!  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We are also sad it rained :(...  The good news is it rarely rains here so your chances are excellent the next time will be sunshine :)

Summary: We were in town for a wedding and were very pleased with the comfortable room and the daily breakfast that was offered.  The staff was all friendly and accommodating. I thought for the area the room rate was very reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you Katie, we hope you had a great time at the wedding.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and we want to thank you for the wonderful review!

Summary Heading: Nice value for the location. A little distance from the pier but a nice walk to the beach
Summary: A good value with comfortable breakfast offering. The weather is perfect. The pier is only a 2 mile drive but shorter walk along the beach. The main street is a mile away. Restaurant offerings are an easy four minute walk. If you like the beach, this is a nice alternative to the pricy pier hotels.
Manager Response: Dear Sterling_Traveler8,  We would like to thank you for your wonderful review regarding your stay with us  at the Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn.  We take a lot of pride in our Free Breakfast and our location regarding the Beach, Restaurants and wonderful people of San Clemente, California.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Cassablanca Inn

Summary: Easy to find and staff is wonderful.  Parking is a bit tight. We stayed in a room specifically for pets so the room smelt of chemicals.  The area is quiet and the breakfast was good. A staff member was always replenishing and cleaning. I ate breakfast in the patio area. Our room came with coffee maker, mini fridge and microwave.
Manager Response: Dear Crazycruiser59,  We would like to thank you for the wonderful review of your recent stay with us.  Our Hotel location and wonderful Staff will be here to give you our best Customer Service for your next stay.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Services Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: This is a a very nice place to stay while in San Clemente. The rooms are clean and comfortable. The location is great, a quick drive to the beach. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast is simple, but tasty - the waffles are delicious! I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Disneyfayn,  We would like to thank you for the wonderful review that you wrote regarding your recent stay with us.  Our Rooms, Location, Breakfast and Staff are the "Pride and Joy" of our Hotel.  Best Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Services Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: Great, clean hotel close to beach access and downtown.  The pool and Ho ttub were very clean.  The staff was very friendly, nice breakfast.  Had two grandkids and they loved the place.  I would recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear msides123,  We would like to thank you for the wonderful review regarding your stay with us at the Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn.  Our location with both Beach and Downtown access is our pride and joy for our Customers.  The amenities such as the Pool and Hot Tub and, of course, our Free Breakfast!  Please drop by to visit us the next time that you come to visit San Clemente, California.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary Heading: Good size room, convenient location, room smell could be better
Summary: Good size room and bathroom, easy location with restaurants and seven eleven nearby, but room smelt a little funny so had to open windows to remove smell. Staff helpful and nice. Parking was good. Only stayed one night as we were moving on anyway. Nice courtyard if you wanted to sit out and relax.
Manager Response: Dear Georgina B,  We would like to thank you for your wonderful review of your stay with the Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn. For future reference, our front desk is open 24/7 and can take care of most problems for you with one call.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca

Summary: The hotel was nice and close to the beach and restaurants.It was only 30 minutes from the Oceanside soccer complex.  The room was clean and had plenty of room for a roll away. My family and I would come back and stay at this hotel in the further. Had a nice pool and spa.
Manager Response: Dear "jkundarn",  We appreciate your kind words regarding your stay with us at the Best Western Plus Casablanca. Our room are very accommodating for a family especially those who enjoy playing at the Pool with a Spa on site.  Please stop by during your next visit to San Clemente, California.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn.

Summary: Very pleasant and professional staff. The room was nice and had everything I needed. Great location. I would definitely stay here again. It is a short walk to the beach and the trolley and bus stop in front of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Edie Messers,  We thank you so much for your wonderful compliment regarding our Hotel Staff.  Our rooms are the "Pride and Joy" of San Clemente, California.  Our Southern California location with the Beach, the Trolley and the Bus are the best word of mouth advertisement that we could ask for!  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: We were looking for a hotel close to downtown and close to beach that was moderately priced.  Casablanca got some of the way. Not really walking distance to town, nearby beach was covered in rocks and hotel was nice enough but worn.  Room was clean but my wife noticed that for example the curtains were mismatched, we had a dead light bulb, and our air conditioning was not working one night of our three nights.  Breakfast was the standard included breakfast - the bacon was plentiful and well prepared. Not much fruit, lots of carbs. The plaster was banged up on the building exterior, stairwells a mess, and hallway floors hammered.  But the rooms were clean, in decent shape, beds comfortable.  Of the two computers in business center, only one worked.  Manager told me they were 6
Manager Response: Dear Joseph H,  We would like to thank you for the wonderful review response that you forwarded regarding our Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn..   Your kind words regarding our Breakfast "Angell" will be shared with the Staff.   Please stop by on your next visit to San Clemente, California.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: I Loved the location, walking distance to the beach. I like to jog in the morning and enjoyed the easy access to the San Clemente Beach Trail which was a short walk from the Hotel. There were also several good restaurant choices within walking distances to the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Sir or Madam,  We would like to thank you for your wonderful review regarding your last stay with us at the Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn.  Please drop by during your next visit to San Clemente, Calfornia, area.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Services Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn.

Summary Heading: No beach view but close to the beach!
Summary: Stayed for one night. Close to the beach which was great for the kids. Room was moderately clean, older hotel so surfaces have aged. Parking is very tight. Breakfast was pretty standard, nothing to be impressed by. Worked for our stopover and beach visit.
Manager Response: Dear Mai P,  We would like to thank you for your kind words regarding our Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn.  Please stop by to say hello the next time that you are in San Clemente, California.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson  Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: the breakfast was very good.  the attendant made waffles and was very friendly to everyone.I left some clothing in the room and the General Manager mailed it back to me promptly.Very nice staff and room.
Manager Response: Dear Cheftrezza,  We would like to thank you for the wonderful review that you gave to our Breakfast Room Assistant, "Angell".  Also, it's good to hear that your clothing made it home to you.  Please feel free to contact us the next time that you visit San Clemente, California.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary Heading: Charming and lovely.  Try the pool...salt water !  Great staff!
Summary: The room was enormous!  Everything was sparkling clean.  The breakfast was tasty and the staff was warm and welcoming.   Great location.  Pretty.  Reminds me of haciendas I've stayed at in Mexico.  Pretty decor, lovely courtyard, VERY ACCOMMODATING staff. Walked to the beach, great restaurant less than  block away (La Columbia).
Manager Response: Dear CayceCleveland_Ohio,  We wish to thank you for your wonderful review of our Property Location, Decor and Cleanliness.  The Guest Rooms and Breakfast are the "Pride and Joy" of our Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn.  Please drop by on your next visit to San Clemente, California.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Speciaiist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: Casablanca Inn is a quiet peaceful place to stay.  The pool and spa are easy to get to.  The inn has a lovely courtyard with a fountain and makes a nice place to eat breakfast while the hummingbirds flit around the hibiscus bushes.  The rooms are very clean and well maintained.  The balcony rooms overlook the courtyard and are a nice place to enjoy the evening.  The breakfast was amazing and the attendants were always cleaning and adding more food.  They paid attention to their service!  Friendly staff all around.
Manager Response: Dear Sir or Madam,  We would like to thank you for your wonderful review of our Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn located in San Clemente, California.  You included all of our "Pride and Joy" activities for everyone's enjoyment!  The Free Breakfast Buffet is one of our best ways to start your day!!  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Services Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay, short walk to the ocean
Summary: We stayed 6 nights while visiting a relative in the area.  Great location, only a few blocks walk to the beach where there is a hard sand/wooden beach trail. It is maybe a mile walk to the pier, but the ocean is right there the whole way.  The breakfast had eggs and bacon/sausage, waffles, and other bread/rolls choices, juices, coffee.  Every morning, I sat by the fountain in the courtyard and enjoyed breakfast by the palm trees in the quiet.  We didn't use the pool or hot tub this time, but only because we were too busy.  San Clemente is a lovely town with shopping, restaurants and a great fit for this small town girl.  The freeway was close enough to use for short or long drives, but not close enough to hear.  There was a heat wave while we were there, and the air conditioning
Manager Response: Dear "fromsmalltown":  I have been answering reviews and letters regarding guest's stay with us for many years and have never been so moved by the extent and eloquence of your lovely letter!  Please include us in your next visit to San Clemente, California!!  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist  Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: Great location to the beach, with a ton of good restaurants nearby.  nice walking path to the Pier and you can bike to the pier as well.  San Clemente is a great Beach community without all the hootie tootie's and the surrounding beaches.
Manager Response: Dear "dnolan888",  Your wonderful review was as close to perfect as we have ever received!  Also, our wonderful city, San Clemente thanks you as well!!  Please give us a call the next time you are in the area!  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: The staff at check-in were very friendly and made sure we had everything we needed.  The room was very comfortable.  When we go to San Clemente, we always stay here because the prices are good, the staff is pleasant and the room is comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear appelts,  We look forward to the words of appreciation from customers like you.  Kind words are always easiest to share regarding our Front Office Staff and our well appointed rooms!  Please consider our "Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn" for your next visit to San Clemente, California.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: Kalani has always gone above and beyond to make each and every one of my stays better than the last. His welcoming and outgoing personality make the whole stay one to look forward too. I have not one negative to say about Casablanca or the staff. I look forward to staying with you again in the near future!
Manager Response: Dear wjobinacosta,  We cannot thank you enough for your wonderful words regarding one of our STAR front desk employees, Kalani.  Our Hotel loves to hear the good news regarding a good customers' comments.  Please feel free to come to the Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn for your next visit to San Clemente, California.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: We had a party of 12 for my beach wedding and they greeted us with open arms!Amazing customer service, nice rooms, comfy beds, hot breakfast. William goes above and beyond the call of duty!! We will be a new reocurring customer.
Manager Response: Dear Jami K.,  Thank you so much for your kind words regarding our Hotel and Staff.  We appreciate your kind words regarding our Front Desk Manager, William.  The Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn looks forward to your next visit!  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Customer Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: attractive courtyard, some covered parking, staff tries very hard to please. adequate laundry room, daily newspapers, breakfast room (average) ease of check in.....  i am a repeat customer tho so i may have a bias.
Manager Response: Dear Charles T,  We do appreciate your kind review and repeat visit.  Our Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn would welcome you back anytime!!  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary Heading: The Perfect Spot in a Perfect beach Town
Summary: The Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn is San Clemente's best deal. The spacious room features a large mini fridge and microwave with a top quality bed and loveseat. The Wi-Fi works great. You will still need to drive or Lyft to the San Clemente Pier and beach (take the Lyft it is cheaper), The town is laid back and friendly with outstanding restaurants. The ocean water is very clean and the beach safe and well patrolled. The hotel rates were very reasonable despite the usual weekend spike. The staff is friendly and we appreciated the early check in option via email. Don't tell too many people because this town and property will then sell out too quickly!
Manager Response: Dear Thomas F.,  We appreciate your wonderful review regarding your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn.  San Clemente is such a quiet, safe Beach Town and your review covered all of the fun things to do while you stay with us.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: I like this place, free breakfast, nice size pool small gym. walking distance to beach { 4 1/2 blocks ] and 2 blocks from restaurants and fast foods. staff were ok, but friendly.   room size was good. short driving distance to dana point.
Manager Response: Dear sunsign2,  We appreciate the wonderful review of your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn.  Please return to San Clemente, California for your next stay with us!  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: We had a great time for our 2 night stay at the Casablanca Inn. The staff was incredibly friendly and really elevated this hotel from your average. The front desk staff was always so nice and we had nice chats with the woman who runs the breakfast in the morning. The breakfast was complimentary and was quite tasty with an assortment of options. The first morning we decided to have our breakfast outside in the courtyard, was a great way to start the day. The rooms themselves were comfortable and clean and quiet Nothing fancy but that’s not what we were expecting. A quick stroll to the beach and it was quite lovely. Very close to Pendleton and Oceanside where we spent a day and a quick drive to LEGOLAND which was our next destination. Would recommend this hotel for its proximity
Manager Response: Dear Allison,  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with the Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn located in San Clemente, California.    Please give us a call for your next visit.  The staff is our Pride and Joy and we will make your stay exceptional.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: Better than several other lodgings in the area.  Rivals an upscale hotel.  One of the best BW+ I have stayed at.  Check-in was a breeze, hotel staff were very helpful and friendly.  Very clean and surprisingly quiet given the location.  Would definitely stay here again and have referred others here.
Manager Response: Dear Warren,  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us at our Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn.  Your compliments will be shared with our hard working staff.  Please give us a call for your next reservation with us.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary Heading: The room and employees turned out more Awesome with our stay
Summary: The room was so big and having 2 bathroom sinks is great and the tub Loved it! The area is really quiet and close walking to places to eat or have a drink. Breakfast is great too, helps with saying money.
Manager Response: Dear Joanne,  We would like to thank you so much for your wonderful review of our Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn.  The rooms are our specialty...especially with the Jacuzzi Tub.  Our location is so close to the beach that you can walk there.  Please come to visit us again in San Clemente, California, for your next vacation.  Regards,  Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary Heading: Very nice accommodations, very helpful staff
Summary: Rooms were nice and clean, beds very comfortable, nice shower. Nice local restaurants within walking distance as well as a short walk to the beach. Very accommodating helpful staff and good breakfast to hit the road on!

I like staying here because it's walking distance to the beach and only a few minutes from the main shopping/tourist area.  There are a couple of good restaurants within walking distance and a great dive bar called Knuckleheads.  The hotel itself is comfortable enough and has a decent free breakfast from 6:30-9:30 every morning.  The hotel staff was friendly and helpful. My room was spacious and clean, with a nice jetted tub in the bathroom.  My only two gripes are that the walkways and stairways were dirty and needed to be cleaned, the lights on the stairways did not work, and it would be nice if they painted the exterior of the hotel.  Like the free parking!

The Casablanca inn is a regular stop for us because of family that lives nearby, but that being said we are so grateful to have such a nice clean place to stay. we can always rely on having a nice place to stay when we are in San Clemente.

Manager Response: Thank You very much for your kind review.  We really appreciate the positive feedback and will work hard to make sure your future stays are just as memorable.

Summary Heading: Best Place to stay in San Clemente
Summary: I have been staying here for over ten years and have never been disappointed. Great rooms, full breakfast and good internet. I know for sure that this is the best place to stay in San Clemente, California
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review!!! We are so very happy you enjoy our hotel.  We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Two of my closest friends got married in San Clemente this past weekend and I had booked a room at another hotel because the rate was slightly cheaper. MISTAKE. Despite having called and confirmed that I would be bringing my dog, they called me a few hours before the wedding to tell me the room I was in was not pet-friendly. I was horrified, but I have always had a good experience with BW so I gave them a call. A man at the front desk (his name starts with an "M" and I'm so sorry that I cannot remember his name exactly) was WONDERFUL! I was so upset when I called due to the cancellation, but by the end of my call with this man to book at BW, I was in tears due to how courteous, kind, and accommodating he was. I seriously cannot emphasize how much this meant to me. I must say,
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for the great review, I  may just have to post it in my office for all my staff to see.  I am pleased Martin was able to accommodate you and your furry friend.  I hope all of your experiences with Best Western are just as awesome.

Summary Heading: Large room with everything you need
Summary: We spent 3 nights at this property and would definitely return. Our room, #117, was large, clean and comfortable. Service was quick, professional and friendly. Free parking at a location within walking distance to the beach and beach trails was great. The hot breakfast was a bonus, made better by the exceptional service of the friendly staff. My rating of four instead of 5 stars was due to the paper thin walls in our room. We slept well, despite the sound of someone snoring loudly in the room next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for the Great Review.  Believe it or not our walls are double insulated, but the connecting door between the rooms does allow noise in.  If you decide to return, please ask for complimentary ear plugs from the front desk.

Summary: What a very pleasant stay we had.  The staff is excellent and the grounds are well kept.  Angel welcomed us at breakfast and kept the breakfast room spotless and well stocked.  The salt water pool is so nice and the pool area is well maintained with nice outdoor furniture.  The location was good, a little too far from the ocean for us to walk, but a short drive.  The room was noisy, due to being next to a busy street, and we could hear the folks upstairs.  In spite of that, we would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel.  We recently installed the salt water system in our pool & we are pleased you noticed.  We made sure to build the hotel just far enough away from the ocean so that people can work off the fantastic breakfast they eat in the mornings prior to hitting the beach ; )

Summary: At the last minute, we decided to spend a day at the beach.  We chose this place as we had stayed on prior occasions. We were able to secure a reservation. We had a very late check in at around midnight.  Very accommodating staff person advising of all the amenities, and directions to the room.  Easy parking, great breakfast with fresh items and on site assistant explaining all of the options which were available at no cost.  Overall excellent experience.,

Summary Heading: Nice place, only a short walk to beach
Summary: Excellent welcome. This place is older with character! Rooms are large, clean and nicely furnished.  Breakfast was good and the lady taking care of that was very accommodating. We will definitely return.

Reasonably priced for a quick (and last minute) trip. Was disappointed when we went to grab our free breakfast at 6:50a and the room was closed and dark. Had a sign "daily breakfast 6:30 - 9:30a" which had also been stated at check-in the night before. Left us scrambling to find something quick in time to get to a soccer tournament on time. The breakfast option was the primary reason we selected this hotel. Room was comfortable and clean, though.
Manager Response: Hi Steve, Thank you for reviewing our property.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay, but I am very sorry to hear that our breakfast attendant was late opening the breakfast room.  Although this is very rare it does happen and I hope you accept my apology.  Please contact me direct so I can give you a great offer the next time you or your team come to San Clemente for a tournament.

Summary Heading: A loveley visit to San Clemente
Summary: We enjoy staying at Casa Blanca Inn very much. t is our preferred get away. The staff are efficient and cordial. The decor is pleasant and the rooms and grounds are clean and well maintained. The breakfasts are excellent although the dining room is small there are outdoor areas to eat
Manager Response: Dear maryhE3159GT,  Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.   Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.  If I can be of assistance in the future, please don't hesitate to contact me at 949-361-1644.    Thank you again for taking the time to complete the survey. We appreciate your loyalty to our brand.  Regards, Angell Ferguson Guest Relations Specialist Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn

Summary: The Casablanca Inn is a charming, well equipped and friendly Inn. It is a block from the beach and close to so many wonderful things to see. A recent trip to relax after a busy summer led us to relax for a week in San Clemente, CA We were close to the outlet mall, several beaches, Dana Point Harbor, downtown San Clemente and of course the beautiful mission San Juan Capistrano, the jewel of the missions.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in San Clemente
Summary: I come to San Clemente 3 or 4 times a year and always stay at the Casa Blanca.  Its an easy walk to the Metrolink station and walking/bike path to the pier.  Also close to downtown and several good restaurants.  The patio area is great for relaxing and/or having breakfast.  Pool is also great.  Hotels in this area are expensive, but I like this one better than similarly priced hotels.

Have been coming here for many years, always a good time. TVs in rooms and common areas are set up correctly, with no distortion. The breakfast area and the fitness room have been upgraded.  The Staff are always happy and helpful. Great location relative to San Clemente, Dana Point, and Laguna Beach,.

had a great stay and I enjoyed breakfast. I enjoyed the welcoming received by the employees and I also enjoyed the nice hot tub. this city is amazing and I couldn't have asked for a better stay at the best western. one of the best westerns that I have stayed at so far and have no problems. I'm for sure coming back to sleeping in such a nice comfy bed

Great rooms, wonderful breakfast, friendly staff and short walk to the beach. Best Hotel EVER! It was a short drive to the laguna beach Pageant of the Masters, a glorious performance. Very nice pool area with plenty of towels, chairs, a couple of bar-b-q's. There is lots of extra parking on the south side of the hotel if spaces fill up in front.

Summary Heading: Happy Birthday to me and my husband
Summary: The room was great, clean and quiet. Walking distance to the beach.  TGhe hotel was great but these reviews are a pain in the butt! It isnt enough to give positive answers through the survey but then you cant get out if this survey without typing no less than 2oo words. :(

Summary Heading: Great place within walking distance to the beach.
Summary: This is an older hotel that has been renovated. The beds were fairly comfortable and the breakfast has everything you could want. We loved that it is very close to the beach. Check out Ellie's Table cafe for the best honey lattes, pastries and atmosphere and in walking distance. Great stay!
