Summary Heading: Was a wonderful place for my niece's wedding party to stay
Summary: I had a lovely room, very clean.  Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful.  Nice pool and breakfast room.  Elevators to accommodate those requiring extra help.  Easy to get my 90 year old mom around,  who used both a walker and a wheelchair.

Great staff. Clean Rooms. Awesome customer service and location. Tasty breakfast! This is our second stay here this year (2017). My family absolutely loved their stay. The staff is consistently helpful and friendly.

The staff can be very helpful and the service they offer is good. There is a shuttle ride around time (free one) that stops outside. Breakfast is OK ..  but the manager is super! The parking is very tight in the main parking lot and I was driving a small car.

All in all - an average stay.  Good service from front desk.  Clean rooms and plenty of pool towels at poolside.  Breakfast not so good, small breakfast room, sub-par cooked (not so hot) food. Would return, but probably go out for breakfast!

The staff was very helpful and pleasant.  Since it was close to the beach they spray washed the grounds to keep it sand free. The king deluxe room was awesome😀.  We were there for a wedding and they made sure that we received all our room request.  I plan on staying here again.

Wonderful employees (very positive), great breakfast (really too much food), comfortable bed (wish we had this at our house), and large pool (you could actually swim laps). Felt like we were at home. We will stay here again

Summary Heading: Great place and will stay again
Summary: Although the hotel was not on the beach, it was very close.  The room was clean and roomy.  I really liked the balcony we had. The bed very comfortable, the breakfast good and staff helpful. We look forward to staying here again.

What a wonderful place to relax.  It is off the beaten path,aka an interstate freeway, in a quaint, yet packed coastal town, and minutes from a pier and beach.  Staff was very accommodating and friendly.  We stayed in a spacious 1 king room with a peek of the ocean.  The bed mattress was perfect and aside from some noise from the people enjoying the pool, it was a very quiet stay.  Breakfast was nice with hot eggs, bacon, sausage and cereals. .There were various toppings for the delicious waffles served up fresh by a friendly staff member.  Tight space in the breakfast room forced us outside to a cute little fountain side area with tables.  Although, that spot could use a little sprucing up with a gardener.  Nice little hotel for a bit of respite.

The breakfast was a nice touch, but the room was very small with very limited seating. The patio was a great back-up option, but it took several trips to gather our breakfast items (no trays) and the door locked promptly at 9:30 (which the attendant made clear that this was closing time).  The additional 10 minutes she so graciously allowed us did not go unmentioned (3times). Other than the hovering breakfast attendant, the remaining staff were very accommodating.

Stayed one night for a getaway to the beach. Nice clean and comfortable room. Not fancy, but well worth the price. Parking is convenient. Our room had a small balcony overlooking a courtyard with a fountain, very charming. Refrigerator and microwave in the room. Clean pool and jacuzzi area. Approx. one mile to the downtown and lots of restaurants. Less than 1/2 mile to the beach path that we walked all the way to the San Clemente Pier. Very enjoyable walk along the Ocean. Plan on returning next time my wife and I are in San Clemente. Adequate continental breakfast included.

Summary Heading: Best value, clean and friendly hotel
Summary: Best value for money in San Clemente hotels. About 60 rooms in total and booked out often in summertime. Close to beaches and main amenities in San Clemente and on the new trolley line for best street (Del Mar) for restaurants and shopping and also for new outlet mall. Includes daily good hot/ cold breakfast area . Also has other good facilities for a smaller hotel: Weights/fitness room, large and clean pool and jacuzzi, BBQ area and also business office for guests and ample guest parking in 2 car parks on hotel grounds. Staff are very helpful, friendly and accommodating . Consider asking Eric (owner/manager) for availability of the one large apartment in the hotel if you like to cook and have four or less people with you on your trip..apartment is pet friendly. You will not see

Excellent courteous service. Spacious very clean room in a well kept facility. Great air conditioning. Lovely pool.  Very nice breakfast selection including freshly made waffles, bacon, sausage, eggs.  Breakfast includes gluten and dairy free option. Cereal, fruit, juices, and coffee, plus a variety of muffins, pastries, bagels, and English muffins.

Not the best quality but with all you need for your short stay. The pool was good, the breakfast could be better, breakfast area very small. The room was ok but a little damp. overall not too bad for the money you pay

Summary Heading: A GOOD TIME WAS HAD BY BOTH
Summary: Coming here again next month! We love San Clemente and always stay at the  Casablanca ... Close to everything that we wanted to do.The check-in guys were so much fun while being quite helpful at the same time. We're coming here again next month...

Hotel Staff was very friendly and helpful. Room was clean and in good condition. Could not get connected to High Speed internet. Location of Hotel is strange, close to ocean but located on a street of used car dealerships and vacant lots, had a strange feeling about it.

Summary Heading: Incredible value and amazing customer service
Summary: Amazing pool, breakfast, beds, and most of all customer service! The workers at check in were knowledgeable and full of reccomedations for our stay and the lovely woman working the complimentary breakfast made everyone feel welcome and taken care of! Insane location and value. We will be back!

If you are looking for a perfect get away close to the beach, with clean rooms and helpful staff, this is your place.  The breakfast is amazing and quite filling.  The pool is crystal clear and inviting.

At the Best Western Casablanca Inn in San Clemente, the staff is polite and helpful. The room was clean and comfortable and the housekeeping staff did a wonderful job cleaning the room each day. There was a complementary breakfast included which was very good and staffed by a wonderful and friendly woman.

My husband and I stayed for six nights while visiting our daughter.  Very clean hotel and nice staff.  The location was great.  Close to san clemente outlets, beach, and lots of restaurants.  Had a wonderful stay/trip.

Stayed for 2 nights.  LIKES: Large room with balcony Comfortable bed Computer desk Power outlets on each side of bed for phone charger Good bathroom lighting with large counter at sink Old school a/c did a good job of keeping the room comfortable Free breakfast Clean  DISLIKES: Definitely feels "vintage", although it is in good shape for its age Neighborhood has an industrial/commercial feel  SUMMARY: This property won't grab you with style, but is worth returning to because it handles the basics quite well. Would return.

The staff at this hotel is outstanding, great breakfast, so convenient to the beach and I-5. They have a wonderful outdoor patio area that was perfect for our family to hang out in and visit. Good quality.

Summary Heading: Solid, Clean, Affordable Hotel that Could Use Some Updating
Summary: Hotel is clean, affordable, excellently located (no ocean views though) and run by competent and courteous staff.  It's an attractive place with a pleasant layout and courtyard as well.  Not run-down at all, but looks slightly dated with some small details neglected.  Don't let that scare you off, it's a great value, but if they invested a little bit more time into the look of the hotel, it would really be exceptional (but only if the price stayed the same, which I guess it wouldn't!).

Our room was a dark cave since it was on the ground floor opening to a covered part of the parking lot. Whatever--I only expected a niceish motel. Room was clean and we were able to walk to good restaurants, the beach and Avenida del Mar.  However our last morning there I awoke to a loud car revving its engine in the parking lot right outside and our room filling with fumes. It was then that I figured out the window was open. We hadn't opened it so maybe it was housekeeping or somebody from outside trying to break in? Once I closed it, I saw there was no latch or lock on the window! Somebody could climb into the room easily from outside!  The front desk comped us some money off but generally seemed unconcerned about the "inconvenience" of what's a pretty obvious safety issue.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff, Thank you for bringing this up to our attention.  Our maintenance staff has investigated the window in the guest room you occupied, and have fixed the issue with the window lock.  I am pleased the front desk gave you a significant discount off your stay.  Please accept our apologies for not checking the safety devices of your guest room prior to your stay. Sincerely,

Summary: Everywhere smelled like cigarette smoke, even in my non-smoking room. The bed was uncomfortable. The water in the vending machine was sold out, which is terrible. The front desk person was nice enough to give me a bottle of water. The only real positive thing I have to say is that the front desk person was very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Andrea, We are very sorry to hear about your experience with us.  We will take this information to help make improvements to our guest's experience.  Unfortunately we cannot prevent people from smoking in every area of the hotel.  We do not permit smoking in rooms, hallways and common areas, however smoking is permitted in our parking lots only, and with a small property like ours, unfortunately smoke can linger into our common areas.  I hope you accept our apologies for this inconvenience. Sincerely,

Summary: We have family in San Clemente and we always stay at the Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn. The beds are great. I sleep better than at home. Our room was clean, quite and spacious. We use to have a little dog now we just enjoy other people with their dogs.

Summary Heading: Family visit over the holiday weekend
Summary: We have stayed at the Casa Blanca previously and were not disappointed with our recent stay. It's location is perfect for visiting family but also close proximity to the beach and outlet mall. Lots of things to do in the area. We also enjoyed the complimentary hot breakfast, great way to start the day. We will be back again! Thanks to all the friendly and caring staff

Perfect location! 2-3 blocks to beach and you can head south on the walking trail to get to the famous San Clemente Pier. We walked along beach trail to the Pier, had lunch and then shopped a bit in downtown and walked back through the neighborhoods. According to my GPS, it was 4 miles total.  There was also plenty of paid parking (fairly cheap) right near the Pier if you want to drive.  There is also plenty of parking near the shops downtown, most of which are free.  Rooms were clean and had nice bathroom and shower.   Free Breakfast was great! Angel was a great hostess, and the gal in the kitchen made great scrambled eggs. They had sausage, bacon, eggs and self-serve waffles with some great toppings available that you don't often see.   Cereal, juice, yogurt, bread, muffins,

The location was perfect for our trip. Drove in from out of state to view a wedding venue. This best western was in walking distance to the venue and the ocean and beach. Our stay was perfect and the hotel with amenities will be perfect for many of our guests coming in from our is state for the wedding. We have reserved rooms for our family and friends. Thank you to all the very nice staff that made our trip wonderful.

Sometimes you have to wonder who comes up with the design.  To watch the sunset over the ocean, you can only do so from our bathroom window.  However, the staff are super friendly and the rooms clean so definitely a decent place to stay if in the area just could have been so much better!
Manager Response: Hi Vic, We agree with you on the design point.  About 4 years after the hotel was built the owner knew it was a flaw not to build balconies facing the ocean.  Originally they were not added because the owner did not like the view on the way to the ocean from the hotel.  He had an architect draw up plans to add balconies facing the ocean, but due to structural limitations the renovation was cancelled.  Maybe one day we can look at a remodel of some guest rooms to offer that convenience in our standard rooms.  We do have rooms with ocean views, but only 5 at the moment.

Summary: The Casablanca Best Western is in a great location.  It is close to the new mall, restaurants, the beach and local attractions.  They serve an excellent hot breakfast and the kitchen staff make certain everyone is well feed to start the day.  The rooms are spacious and clean and, for those of us who travel with seniors, there is a handy elevator to access all of the rooms.  The bonus was the free parking.

Perfect location, beach is a short walk away. Lots of options within walking distance. Also close to the Farmers Market on Wednesdays. I stay here every chance I get as it is easy to get to the Interstate and I can hit the beach every afternoon.

Great location, clean rooms, and a lot more than the usual continental breakfast.  Close to the beach, restaurants, and train stop. The staff was helpful, polite and approachable. The grounds are well maintained and the pool is delightful.

Check in process was very efficient with a friendly receptionist.  The building is an older building, but the rooms seem to have been remodeled within the past couple of years. We chose a king bed with balcony and spa.  We actually didn't use the spa, but liked having the balcony.  It was disappointing that the room we got (room 314) did not have a good view at all.  The balcony looked out onto the roof.  We were able to walk to the pier walkway that is within a few blocks.   The room was spacious and comfortable.  The bed gave us a good sleep quality. The breakfast room was a bit small and crowded.  Nothing special about the breakfast, about the same as you will find at most hotel breakfast areas.  It was, however, nice that there was an attendant there at all times to make the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a detailed review on your recent stay with us. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we sincerely hope that you will have the chance to stay us again soon.            Sincerely, Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: A great place for vacationers traveling through the cities of California and wanting to stay in a short time in each hotel, a great and comfortable hotel with super attentive staff! They did not let us lack anything!
Manager Response: Daniel T, We are so thrilled that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Delivering excellent customer service is a priority for our staff, and we are thankful that you have experienced it. Hope to see you again soon!           Sincerely,               Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: This is an older building, but the rooms seem to have had recent updates.  The furnishings are up to date and comfortable. We enjoyed that it is within walking distance to the beach walkway. The staff was friendly and helpful.   The breakfast room was a bit of a disappointment because it is a regular room converted to an eating area so it was a bit crowded. There were not enough tables and chairs in there for the amount of customers.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We are pleased to know that you found our location and staff to be of your liking. However, we would like to apologize for falling short of your expectations regarding our breakfast location. Although the seating in our breakfast room is very limited, we do our best to accommodate by having tables to eat at in our outside courtyard seating area, and by the pool area. Reviews like yours are valuable as they enable us to target areas we need to improve on, such as the breakfast area. We value you as our guest and hope we get the chance to accommodate you again.               Sincerely,                    Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: Love this place and will definitely be back. Great location, price, clean, great breakfast. Nice pool & jacuzzi. I will come back again and again when I come to San Clemente . My stay was fabulous and the parking was easy to come in and out of
Manager Response: amyaA8473UK,  We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and that we met your expectations! Thank you for your positive feedback on your visit with us. We can't wait to welcome you back on your next trip to the Casablanca Inn!   Sincerely, Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: My sister and I stay one night for her birthday, the room was very comfortable and clean, the lobby was very nice, my sister and I enjoyed the continental breakfast, if ever in town I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback on your recent stay with us! Your compliments are greatly appreciated and we sincerely hope that you will have the chance to visit us again soon.  Sincerely, Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: Very clean hotel with friendly staff.  Room has good wifi and a jacuzzi tub.  Breakfast is very good and eating area is clean with helpful staff.  Bed was very comfortable.  TV was good with premium channels.  All in all a very good stay at this location like always.
Manager Response: Dear SandTrader, Thank you for your generous review. At the Casablanca Inn we work hard to give our guests a quality stay- from the upgraded breakfast offerings, to the HD TV channels and comfortable beds. The staff is glad you enjoyed our stay, and we hope you choose to stay with us again soon!  Best Regards, Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary Heading: escape to Casa Blanca San Clemente!
Summary: A great place to stay while visiting San Clemente!  Great breakfast and a good pool!  great location!  A 5 minute walk to the ocean!  where you will find the famous San Clemente Pier! Also some really great restaurants ans sunsets!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review; we love having such a fantastic location! We sincerely appreciate your business with us, and we look forward to your next visit to the Best Western Casablanca Inn.   Sincerely,  Maile G, Guest Relations.

Summary: In the first room I had Broken heater, and it was cold. The second room had broken phone, broken vent in the bathroom. I was told the pool was heated, yet it was very cold. I stayed 3 nights in two different rooms.
Manager Response: Dear 24celinar, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We sincerely apologize for the unfortunate circumstances that had occurred during your stay. Our team will use the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we provide a better experience in the future. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a much more pleasant stay the next time your travels bring you to San Clemente. Again, thank you for your time.                  Best Regards,                            Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: I always enjoy my stay here at the casablanca. The room was  clean and comfortable and with all the amenities on site a great value for the price. Ended up checking in late and Kellie at the front was welcoming and thankfully swift with the checkin as I was tired and ready to crash.the other two front desk agents in the afternoon maile and kalani were very helpful and knowledgeable overall great staff, Great breakfast options,  fast wifi, and a warm outdoor pool and  jacuzzi.
Manager Response: Dear Brian,  Thank you for your kind words regarding our staff and property. It is important to us to make all of our guest's stay with us comfortable and pleasant. We are so thrilled to read that our rooms and staff exceeded your expectations- your kind words have been passed along to all who are responsible in making your visits with us enjoyable. We sincerely  appreciate your business with us, and we look forward to your next visit to the BW Casablanca Inn !   Sincerely,   Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: Very satisfied with the room and amenities.  Good jet tub, large room, fast internet.  I like staying in Best Western hotels - always predictable quality of the room, well trained stuff and good value.  I would recommend this hotel to everyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We are happy to hear that  you have had a wonderful stay at our hotels, and our location specifically. We are  thrilled to read that our rooms and staff met your expectations. It is always a pleasure to hear our guests enjoyed their stay, and I know our team here will be happy to read everything you mentioned. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to San Clemente.   Sincerely, Maile Gilkerson, Guest Relations

Summary: We had to stay out of our home for fumigation for termites. We decided to stay at the Best Western in san Clemente. The facility was immaculate. The rooms were large and very comfortable. The breakfast was more than adequate. The employees were friendly. I was told that they have all worked there forever. We had a room on the 3rd floor and was very quiet. no street noise.
Manager Response: Dear normaredk, I am so pleased you had a wonderful experience at our hotel. We take pride in ensuring our guests are satisfied with their experience with us. We have recently upgraded our breakfast room and food offerings and we are excited they made a positive impression on you. The team looks forward to welcoming you back to San Clemente the next time your travels bring you our way.                           Sincerely,                                Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: For the price,  this is a great hotel. There really isn't much of an ocean view, but you are located within walking distance of a beautiful beach. There is a fountain in the courtyard with tables and chairs. I stayed there on a business trip, and I would return for pleasure. It's not your high-end Hyatt or Hilton, but it is very quaint and within driving distance to major attractions. The breakfast in the morning was perfect. The employee who was greeting people and offering to make them waffles, was absolutely delightful!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback on your recent stay with us. I will be sure to share your kind words with Angel, our lovely breakfast attendant. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and we hope you have the chance to visit us again soon.                             Sincerely,                                Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: very nice staff...Hotel close to everything....overall a great value. covered parking was very nice surprise. the beach was 5 minutes away.  front desk made excellent food suggestions. I would recommend this hotel to anyone for a good base hotel for exploring the area/
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a great review; we love having such a great location. We hope you get the opportunity to come back and stay with us again soon!                                Sincerely,                                   Maile G, Guest Relations.

Summary: We travel around up and down California for leisure and have all had great experiences with each Best Western Hotel or Resort and that's a lot of traveling too.  I love they offer free hot breakfast choices, always clean & nicely decorated rooms too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We always do our best to give each one of our guests a quality stay- from the breakfast offerings, to the comfort and cleanliness of each room. We hope you will stay with us again soon!                                  Sincerely,                                     Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: This hotel is a little bit outdated but it's still a pretty good hotel. Stayed here for one night and I slept so good. Good additions in the shower with dispensers instead of bars or samples. Very good breakfast and amazing view
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our property. Although our building is a bit old-fashioned- we do our very best to keep our amenities modernized and refurbished for the comfort of our visitors. The team is glad you enjoyed our stay, and we hope you choose to stay with us again soon!                                 Best Regards,                                          Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: This was a really great hotel.  Very clean. Great staff. Very helpful. Easy to find with plenty of parking spaces.  Will be staying there again later in the year when I come for another vacation in so cal
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review for our hotel. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: All I can say it's just average.  The bed was comfortable the accommodations were average poolside was pretty nice considering the hot tub was clean just a little small good for a family not a romantic getaway.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements for future guests. We hope to see you again in the future.                   Sincerely,                            Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: I stay at this hotel several nights every year.  I have many hotels in the area to choose from.  It is comfortable and consistently friendly.  They have even supplied me with toothe brush and paste for unexpected stays. Furniture needs upholstery cleaned.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel above all of the other great hotels in the area. Our primary focus is to provide our guests with a delightful vacation experience. I would like to apologize on behalf of our team for the upholstery, as we take cleanliness of our rooms very seriously. I have taken note of your comments and shared them with the team- so we can find the room you were located in and get that furniture looking clean! We look forward to welcoming you back for your next trip.                                       Sincerely,                                        Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary Heading: The great and not so good.
Summary: Great location near the beach and the Metrolink train, and a reasonable walk to the pier.  The staff are friendly and very helpful. The room is clean and comfortable.  Unfortunately, the toiletries are skimpy and of poor quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We appreciate the compliments on the property's location, cleanliness, and staff. I am sorry for any inconvenience you experienced due to the amount of toiletries received. I have taken note of your comments and have shared these with our team for the purpose of bringing improvements needed. More toiletries are available upon request, and staff is willing to deliver as much needed at any time.   I hope that you would give us another chance to make your stay as best as it can be.  Sincerely,   Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary: Wife and I checked for a 3 night stay during Valentines Day. The rooms have been remodeled but still have a quaint "70's" look. Our large room featured 2 queen size comfortable beds, a table with 2 chairs, a single sink and separate bath. Plenty of hot water for your shower, but shampoo and conditioner are on wall dispensers that can be difficult. The room was quiet and easy to sleep in. Wifi was great; but the TV was a problem. It has Direct TV but there were 30 seconds before the set would change channels. No channel surfing here! The highlight by far was the breakfast of good sized waffles, scrambled eggs, bacon, fresh fruits, delicious Farmers Brothers coffee and more. I'd seen other reviews, praising  Angel, the host for breakfast. I expected a large man with a bit of ink
Manager Response: Dear Mike, Thank you for the great review of our property.  We agree that sometimes it can take up to 30 seconds to change channels when trying to surf with DirecTV.  Although most of the time it does not take that long, when the weather is poor it can be challenging.  The biggest reason for the change was to ensure all channels are HD and the wide variety DirecTV offers as compared to our local cable company who could not offer HD channels and had a limited amount of stations available.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Please fix the tv and the tub
Summary: The staff was courteous and professional, however they didn't do much to fix the issues with the tv. I had a friend on a show that I wanted to see and they basically told us oh well, maybe next time, which was very disappointing. Also, I needed the wi fi to work from the room and the guy at the front said it may or may not work, which made me nervous so I had to work from a Starbucks instead. The entire reason we chose this hotel was because of the tub in the room and the jets didn't work on them. So that was very disappointing.

Great time. Pool was warm (in winter), jacuzzi clean. Staff awesome. WiFi easy. Breakfast for kids terrific! Highly recommend this place as a great bargain. A little dated but who cares! You're near the beach!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us your great review. Our number one goal is to give our guests an awesome vacation experience. We keep both our pool and spa heated year-round for the enjoyment of our guests. The team is ecstatic that you enjoyed our free WiFi and breakfast offerings as well. We sincerely hope that you and your family will visit us again soon!                                  Sincerely,                   Maile G, Guest Relations

Summary Heading: Clean with a Great Location and Breakfast
Summary: We were delighted with our stay at the Best Western in San Clemente.  It was a short walk to the beach and a terrific 2+ mile trail along the beach and not far from a new park overlooking the beach with great views.  We enjoyed exploring San Clemente, especially the downtown shopping area and the Pier, where we ate twice at the Fisherman's restaurant.    The staff at the Best Western was very friendly and accommodating, especially at a very generous breakfast each morning.  Our room was clean and well-equipped.  We would certainly go back if we are in the area again and would recommend this Best Western.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on your recent stay at our property. We're extremely pleased to know you enjoyed your stay with us, and what our beautiful community has to offer as well. We hope you get the opportunity to come back and visit us again soon!                                  Sincerely,                                      Maile G, Guest Relations.

Summary: this gem of a hotel is beyond description.  There is not one person on this property that isn't there to cater to their guests.  Angel, our breakfast hostess, is just the most adorable lady you would want to meet.  The front desk staff is there to answer any and all questions....they even had a corkscrew to open our bottle of wine.  The housekeepers do an outstanding job.  I just can't say enough good things about this hotel.  We will return next year when we are "wintering" in this area. As  a side note:  we have two dogs and they could not have made our pups feel more welcome.   Kudos to this amazing place!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We appreciate the thorough review you gave us, and we are very pleased you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: The service was very good. Room was clean and they were pet friendly. Great location.  Walking distance to the beach and several restaurants. The breakfast served was very good.  Included sausage,  bacon and eggs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We have worked hard to give our guests a quality stay, including the upgraded breakfast offerings.

Summary: Services was ok! Room offers coffee, but no couple waters in the room. Vending machines would be better, if offered bottle waters. Other hotels we have stayed, they have few waters right by coffee machines as courtesy
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  Although we do not offer bottled waters, we always have a water cooler located by the coffee for any guest to use.  We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice locaton, quiet room with lot of space
Summary: I stopped here for 2 days to sleep off my jet lag before going to San Diego. Room was huge, there was a big storm going on outside but I couldn't even hear the rain. Managed to go for a run one morning along the beach to the pier and back, about 3km total.   Great little spot if you don't need fancy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!!! I agree, we may not be fancy, but our service goes above and beyond, and the little things like over 100 HD TV channels are a great reason to stay with us.

Summary: I was fortunate to visit San Clemente and even more to have experienced a very nice stay at the Best Western Casablanca. The staff here is incredibly friendly and helpful, everybody I had the pleasure to encounter was either extremely cordial, willing to help and determined to accommodate they serve a decent Breakfast and have such a wonderful hostess in the Breakfast dining area that makes you feel as if your a long time friend asking her guest if they're feeling "wafflely" this morning say 'yes' and your waffle is on its way (didn't have to show everyone how clumsy I am with that simple to use waffle maker thing) thank you Ms. Wafflely it is very nice of you to remove that little task of making our own waffles as we're still grumbling from having to wake up  oh and thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our hotel.  It seemed you enjoyed everything, but only gave us 3 out of 5 :(.  Please let us know what we could have done better to earn those additional stars

Summary: Top notch service love this place. Pool and jacuzzi is privately situated. Free breakfast scrambled eggs, sausage,  bacon, waffles, danish, fruit, bagels, English muffins, apple juice, orange juice, milk, excellent coffee, cereal etc... Great deal you will not be sorry.  Will visit again. Thank you very much for your hospitality.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, good location off the beaten path.
Summary: I booked this one from the best western website, without really knowing what to expect. It was really nice! We had a nice view of the courtyard, with our own balcony. On the other side, we had a street view... still nice. There was restaurants across and down the street. We walked from the hotel down to the beach... maybe a 1/8 mile away. I will definitely stay here again. It did have a nice little clean pool too. If your looking for a laid back place, this is it.

We have made the Casa Blanca our home away from home. We enjoy its location , rates, staff and sorounding areas. We have been coming here for about 20 years. The staff here are very hospitable, friendly😍

we loved it the rooms are huge the beds are so nice   the staff at the hotel is amazing we did takeouts from local restaurants  we had the breakfast   the staff was helpful so much  the locatioin is the best walk to coffee shop walk to the north beach   bike rentals on the corner   love this place

We picked this hotel because of price and I saw the pictures before I booked, so I knew sort of what to expect.  The rooms do feel a bit old with the bedding, carpeting, and bathroom.  It's definitely due for a remodel soon.  But when you factor in the price compared to other hotels it was a pretty good deal.  On the plus side, it's a 3 block walk to the beach.  The beach had nice sand and was kid friendly.  The hotel was also close to the freeway and shopping, so that was another plus.  They do offer free breakfast in the mornings.  The quality was slightly below an Oxford Suites breakfast.  One negative was the parking lot and how it's arranged.  The spaces are really tight!  There were a lot of cars parked really close to each other.  I saw 2 instances of where 1 car was

Not a good stay, so far best western has been good. This stay was not. I may have to consider other hotels in the area when coming here. Staff as usual at best western was amazing. The worst part of the stay was all that i already graded

We had a wonderful stay. It was close to all the places we wanted to go. The amazing food across the street, and the short walk to the beach. We absolutely loved the hot tub by the pool and the jacuzzi in the hotel room.  All your staff were friendly and so amazing. The housekeepers and kitchen ladies were especially wonderful.  Thank you for a wonderful stay.

I have stayed at this hotel many times over the past 9 years.  It is always a pleasure.  Close to nice restaurants, good beds, good breakfast and convenient to downtown San Clemente and the beach.  Nice hotel.

Perfect little hotel. The breakfast with a hostess was excellent, so much better than most. The hostess made our waffles and brought them to our table, helped serve our coffee and was attentive in every way!  The room even had two luggage racks!  There needs to be one for each traveler so this was great.  It was within walking distance of beach.  The lobby carried the WSJ, so nice to have a quality complementary paper each morning. Can't say enough good things about this place!  Best hotel in a long time.

We stay here frequently. The rooms are always very comfortable and quiet. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. We have stayed in several of the rooms, whether regular or the deluxe spa rooms, and they are equally comfortable. We would always recommend this hotel.

I have stayed here a few times now, and my wife and I have always enjoyed our stay. The hotel is always quiet and the beds are great, so sleep quality is amazing. The continental breakfast is awesome and Angel will even make you a custom order waffle! They have a board room, an surprisingly well-equipped fitness room, and a clean pool and jacuzzi. I highly recommend this hotel if you are looking for a quiet stay or will be in town for a few days because the prices are great!

Very satisfied with stay. Pool was very clean and and nice to use. Breakfast was good and service at breakfast was excellent.Rooms were kept clean use of wifi was a nice added value. Only problem was hanging clothes in the closet since the door hit hangers when closing them.

Hotel was conviently located just minutes off of Hwy 5. We arrived on a Thursday night and experciencd a clean and quite room. A nice Continental breakfast was available for us to enjoy the next morning. From the check in to the breakfast room we found hotel staff to pleasant and friendly.

Always consistent, quiet, and well maintained hotel. I will always stay here when I am working this area. I have stayed at this location 20+ times and will again.  The staff is great, and the manager is consistent and fair. They take care of the guests.

We had bypassed staying at Casa Blanca over the last few years because the breakfast was so terrible.  We were looking at options for our most recent trip and noticed reviews complimenting the breakfast, so we gave it another try.  It was a major improvement over what it was a few years ago.  We love the location of Casa Blanca - close to downtown S.C. and close to the Metro-Link and beach front trail.  We enjoy the pool and spa too.  All San Clemente hotels seem over-priced, and this one seemed in line with others.

after having an small accident at the beach, was nice to arrive to a friendly staff hotel that made everything better. for sure will to same hotel if going to San Clemente. Hotel si only 32 minutes from Disney, near beautiful beaches of San Clemente home of the Tritons, 45 minutes to San Diego, ideal to go everywhere in southern California.

The hotel was really well located and easy to get to from the freeway. It was not the closest to downtown but within walking distance to the beach. The staff were friendly, helpful and really polite. The double room with two queen beds was large and clean and yet simple. It was a great experience overall.

I stay at the Casa Blanca Inn many times for family events in town. This hotel is a very nice stay every time. The staff is very nice and the room is always clean. The breakfast is ok but the staff was very nice serving.

The pool is fantastic, the hotel staff are friendly and helpful.  The breakfast was perfect to start the day.  The location is close to the coastal bike trail and other view spots.  Easy walk to the beach

My husband and I drove from Las Vegas to this wonderful hotel for a short R and R. We were not disappointed. Location is a couple of blocks from the ocean. We walked the entire trail right up to the pier.  Check in was quick and easy. Our room on the third floor was clean and spacious. Ice and soda machines were close by. There is a nice courtyard with a fountain by the entrance near the elevators. There is ample parking.  Breakfast was great. Angel who looks after the breakfast dining room is. Very friendly and accommodating. She made for us our waffles. Breakfast here is probably one of the best for this category hotel.  We would definitely stay here again in the future and we will tell our friends and relatives.

This small hotel had a boutique feel with the garden seating right in front of the room.  We asked for a bottom floor room, close to parking for my 86 year old mother.  The room location was perfect.  Very nice pool area, decent breakfast, and minutes to the Pier, Del Mar Ave, and the beach.  We used Uber to go the the Pier for happy hour - makes life easier if you are there on a weekend. Walking distance to some restaurants. Nice place!

This motel is a typical Best Western that is an older upgraded facility that is in a good location. The staff were helpful and competent. There was a nice pool area and the included breakfast was adequate. Room was quiet and well appointed.

We had a great time, the room was nice and roomy and the location of the room was in a quiet location, which we loved, we will be back again for a relaxng time again soon, and the weather was perfect,  and the breakfast was awesome, and the coffee was the best!!!!!!

We stayed a couple nights here and will definitely be back on our next visit to California. Staff were great, William was on duty when we checked in, really lovely.  Rooms are clean, friendly,great location.

I came to San Clemente with 3 friends, and it was pretty hard to find a place with a fair price during the WSL (world surf league championship) and out of nothing we found this hotel. The price was even lower than private houses, which made us wonder if there was anything wrong with the place (probably was dirty, ugly, etc)... Well, glad to say we were wrong, the hotel is really cute, close to everything, clean, good wifi signal, and the staff is  really friendly and helpfull.   It's not a luxurious place and the breakfast is standard, but even so, I would definitely come back and recommend it for other people!

We really enjoyed the easy atmosphere of the Casablanca Inn.  The hotel is nicely maintained and clean.  The bed and amenities were great.  The buffet breakfast was a surprise and good.  We felt comfortable and at home.

Summary Heading: The gem of San Clemente California
Summary: My husband and I have been staying here for many years. Usually 2-4 nights when we visit relatives. There is so much to see and do in the area. The staff are among the best anywhere we have stayed in the world and make us feel at home each time we visit. It is a wonderful and clean and quiet hotel. I like that the pool is heated and the hours are great for my schedule. So thank you Casablanca again for a wonderful time.

This hotel was recommended by my father who stays there frequently. I too agree it is a nice, quiet, clean hotel. The staff is very friendly and welcoming. Walk to the beach. Walked to restaurants. Nice little breakfast included to get you going for the day. Would stay again for sure.

We stayed for a wedding and everything was terrific!! only complaint was the parking lot, very small. Otherwise the stay was great! Front desk staff were very helpful. Wish we could have stayed longer

Nice getaway fro two days. Very close to the beach. Breakfast was very good and Angie was very helpful during the breakfast, lively and talkative. She is an excellent host--loved the waffles! Overall good time. Also close to San Clememnte Beach walk---be sure to do it!

A very decent place for a fair price. Our room was large with a table and 2 chairs, plus the norm. The breakfast was adequate, other than the fruit nothing was truly healthy, but it kept us going until lunch. There's a great Japanese restaurant across the street which we had dinner at 3 of our 4 nights. We would return.

Very nice and clean hotel, very close to the beach and downtown San Clemente. I enjoyed the swimming pool after a long day at the beach, and had a good breakfast before I check out. The staff were very professional and helpful. I really enjoyed the stay, will go back every year.

This is the ideal “bargain” motel for families.  Clean, decently appointed with willing and helpful staff.  The breakfast (included) was decent “motel” food and no one went hungry.  The location is ideal for spending time at the beach in this low key beach community.    San Clemente is also well located for other attractions in the area, although the traffic leaving the immediate area can be miserable (the 5 freeway is undergoing a major facelift; not sure if that will ultimately help or not, however).  Also, the Metrolink (commuter train) station is very close by (5 minute walk).  While not the best public transportation, it connects all of the costal cities and can even get you to San Diego on the South or Los Angeles on the North with infrequent service.    Finally, We were

Summary Heading: Great Location near beach and train station
Summary: Great value, pool/ jacuzzy area outstanding, nice full breakfast offered, efficient friendly staff. Great location walking distance to San Clemente north Beach and Train Station. Complementary parking.

This is a nice motel, close to restaurants and the beach is only about three blocks away. Good service and value. The breakfast room had someone who made the waffles and was very friendly and helpful.

We stayed in this hotel during one week. Staff was very friendly. Our room was great with a very nice patio. Breakfast was perfect except coffee which was not strong enough for us.  In the breakfast room, there is a very nice lady in charge who is taking care of everyone. Hotel only 2 blocks from the beach at a walking distance. You can start the beach trail at "North Beach". There is a free of charge parking lot at the hotel I would definitely recommend this hotel.

If you have a wedding or a big group stay here.  Otherwise, you will suffer the consequences of everybody else's party.  My weekend was ruined by lack of sleep.  Make sure you ask ahead of time about that.  I've stayed here 4 times and got burned twice.  I'm done.

Summary Heading: 100% Satisfied ' Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn '
Summary: The only place we will stay in San Clemente based on value and our wonderful experience. Recommended by a friend of ours that lived in San Clemente for 30 years. She didn't let us down. Great location, excellent service, clean room, comfortable bed, friendly staff. Overall great experience! Try it, you will not be disappointed .

All the basics were well-covered and I am happy with my stay.   My room was very clean, wifi was free, and the hotel was pretty quiet even though I stayed on a Friday and Saturday.   Other stuff: - there is a nice, good sized pool  - parking is available on site at no cost - buffet breakfast is included - centrally located - everything in town or the main beaches are <10 minutes driving or 30 minutes walking - it is a 2-3 star hotel, so nothing fancy

I picked this place as I had never stayed in San Clemente.  This hotel is so reasonable and quiet!  I had a great room with a super comfortable bed.  I would definitely stay here again!  Parking a little tight, but all good!

Summary Heading: In this cateogory it is a nice place
Summary: It is a little pricey for this type of accommodation, however, there are some upsides:  Very clean.  Good sheets.  Nice pool.  Great location.  Parking.  Breakfast.  Overall I thought it was pretty good and although not my favorite type of hotel, it was still pretty good.

Hotel location was very good. This is very close to beach. walkable around 10 -15 minutes , not more than 0.3 miles. Room was also good. had a nice view of the outside courtyard. Bathroom needs update. maybe instead of tub have shower as the water in the tub did not go that quickly.

We were in town for a Wedding and spent 1 night here. Room/Beds etc were nice. It's a small area Hotel is on so parking is really tight. It's walking distance down to beach I'll guess about 10 minutes or so. It was quiet at night. Morning breakfast was good, they offer enough different things to satisfy most everyone.

We really enjoyed our stay, staff were very helpful, breakfast staff work really hard to provide a nice breakfast. Rooms are large and clean with very comfortable beds. Best to have a car to get around to main areas. Columbian restaurant across the roads is excellent and good value. We loved staying here.

My husband and I stayed at Best Western Casa Blanca for 3 nights in July. It is conviently located 2 blocks from the beach. We walked along the boardwalk every evening and enjoyed our dinners on the San Clemente pier. Workers were very friendly and the included breakfast is a nice perk.

This room was a very pleasant surprise, though the mattress was softer than I prefer.  We had a large room in a quiet section of the property.  The hot breakfast with a very helpful attendant was an added plus.  The only negatives were not being informed at Check-in of the overflow parking lot, which we needed due to our late return from an event (we were informed by the Night Manager, who happened to be exiting her car in the main lot as we were cruising the lot looking for an empty space), the other issue is a personal safety concern.  The shower/tub did not have a rubberized mat or pads in the tub, just the very slippery glazed surface.  I ended up spreading a hand towel in the tub to avoid a slip & fall when I showered.  When checking out, I informed the Desk Clerk of this

My husband & I celebrated our anniversary by taking a trip to San Clemente.  We had stayed at this Best Western before & were pleased with it again during our stay.  The staff is very professional, friendly & well-trained.  At the desk Maria & Martin went out of their way to find us the room that would meet our needs.  The room was on the 3rd floor & it was quiet &  comfortable.  Parking is always a challenge at the beach but we had a space each night. It is an older hotel but well-maintained. They had a lady named Angel assist the guests with breakfast.  She was an angel & the breakfast was quite good with very good coffee. I will stay there again on our next visit. It is close to the state park & the charming downtown.

My self and my wife arrived  here on Thursday June 23, the room was not ready yet but the front desk managed to give us the room about 1:00 pm. They accommodated us by offering coffee and the Internet access wifi. There are four stands near the fountain in from of the lobby, I used to enjoy sitting there and have coffee. One great thing that the hotel offer coffee and cold water whenever you need. The room is spacious and has two queen bed, rest rooms are very clean and you can have sufficient number of towels. The front desk people are so friendly, courteous and helpful. The place is about 5 min walk from the beach. Many restaurants and coffee shops and bars are near by. On Friday we enjoyed an excellent meal at New Mandarine garden about .8 ml from the hotel. I invited my

Awesome Place to Stay . Close to the beach, Lots to do  Local Restaurants. Beautiful Area, San Clemente Pier close by  Bike Friendly Pets welcome , Lots to do with the kids . Also the Metrolink and amtrak at the San Clemente Pier for scenic rides or even to San Diego and Mexico

Although not right down on the beach, this hotel is totally in the right place to get to all of the sights in the San Clemente area. You can see the ocean from the hotel. During our stay while visiting family recently we were able to zip north to Dana Point for dinner easily as well as get around San Clemente with no trouble at all.  The hotel was really quaint with a lovely courtyard and a southwestern design, and our room had a little balcony with chairs that were quite comfortable.  The room itself also was comfortable and well-appointed.  A Best Western breakfast was nice as usual, and got us off to a good start.

We wanted somewhere near the beach, easy to get to from the freeway to get to work early the next am, close to one of our favorite restaurants (Pizza Port) and somewhere clean and comfortable.  We had a great night and plan on another stay very soon!

Made this reservation last minute and was happy with the property. Needed a hotel close to the Marine base which worked out great. Had a late check in but they were ready for me. Parking is a little crowded but once I found the overflow lot it worked out. Staff was very pleasant.

Great quality for the cost.  room very spacious, lots of light,  Friendly and accommodating staff. We found this at the last minute,  and were very pleased with the care they provided. Nice areas to sit and talk.   Breakfast was simple,  but very tasty.

Excellent location for all of SoCal. Nice hotel with a very good breakfast and comfortable rooms. Microwave and refrigerator included, cool A/C. Nice Pool area and fountain area with tables, chairs and umbrellas.

Overall a good place to stay.  Very nice staff, in fact one was too nice.  The breakfast "monitor" tended to "hover" and make suggestions as to what we should have.  Usually a quiet non-intrusive breakfast is what I'm used to.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay in San Clemente
Summary: Visiting relatives and decided to stay here.  Really spacious  clean room with all the amenities.  Check in was smooth and easy and there was free parking.  Desk clerks were friendly and helpful.  Housekeeping was also good.   Nice looking pool which we didn't have a chance to try.  Several decent restaurants within walking distance.  A little way from the center of town (but not far) which made for a much quieter atmosphere and they do NOT take pets which for us is a major plus.  Highly recommend.

Great hotel on Camino Real.  Clean rooms with microwave and refrigerator.  Large King rooms with pull out couches.  Nice helpful staff.  Heated pool and jacuzzi.  Full Breakfast.  Free wifi.  Filtered water in 24 hour lobby.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in San Clemente
Summary: We love the Casablanca Inn.  It is a great place for a weekend get-away for families.  Great location, nice pool, comfortable beds, and friendly and helpful staff.  The Casablanca Inn is close to the beach, the bike path (and bike rentals), and downtown San Clemente.

Had a wonderful stay at Casablanca Inn, very convenient for our holiday weekend for the Doheny Blues Festival. Very easy to get to the park. Hotel staff were wonderful and it was a very nice hotel, very clean.

Summary Heading: Great value, really clean, friendly staff
Summary: Stayed here one night en route to LA. I didn't have high hopes for this place, but we were pleasantly surprised at how nice and clean the hotel was. The rooms were quiet, clean and spacious. Bathrooms were nice. Bed was comfy. Breakfast was included and wasn't a lame continental breakfast. It was a great continental breakfast with fresh made waffles that were delicious. Pretty close to Dana Point attractions (11 min drive). Great stay to cap off our Cali trip. Would stay here again for sure.

This hotel has a great location within 2 blocks of the beach. There are plenty of restaurants within a short drive. Customer service is off the chart. They have a free breakfast which includes eggs, bacon and sausage. Fresh fruit, yogurt and other items are available as well. Mini fridge and micro wave in all rooms. We will stay here again when we come back.

Bad:  Our bed was very uncomfortable, it sagged in the middle. Good: It looks like they are in the process of replacing the beds.  Just a short walk to North Beach.  Friendly, helpful staff. Good breakfast. Two of San Clemente's best secret restaurants (Colombiana and Riders Club) are just a few steps away.

After driving many hours down the California coast, we decided to stop for the night. The first place we saw was this Best Western Casablanca Inn. The price was great, much less than I expected to pay so close to the ocean. The woman at the front desk, Maria, was so friendly and informative. We had asked her about stores and places to eat, and she was spot on in her recommendations. The place is older, but very well kept and very clean. The free breakfast was awesome and Angel, the breakfast hostess was so sweet and helpful. I wish we had more time to spend in this beautiful hotel!

This hotel has the best, and friendliest staff!  Great location  - able to walk or ride bikes into main street - and also close to beach trail.  We'll be back for sure!!!  The breakfast is good - with lots of variety and outside patio/pool is very inviting!
Manager Response: Hi Martha, Thank you reviewing our property.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.  The beach trail was completed around June of 2013, with plans that were recently approved to extend the trail even further.  Currently the trail runs from San Clemente's North Beach to Calafia Beach (about 3 miles).  Non Motorized Bikes are allowed on the trail, but bikers must walk their bikes across all bridges, and around the pier area.  Construction will begin next month to complete the 5 mile trail giving visitors a 10 mile round trip walk or ride from our hotel.  We hope you will come back and stay with us so you may enjoy the finished project.

Summary Heading: Excellant location and great hot breakfast
Summary: Definitely will stay again. We stayed 4 nights while our house got new floors. The location is very close to beach access and a 1.4 mile walk along a great path along the beach to the pier. The breakfast included great eggs, sausage, waffles, and cold cereal, pastries etc.

This is a super cute hotel, blocks from the beach.  There is a lovely pool area and courtyard.  The rooms are clean and attractive and large.  The breakfast was great.  The staff was all friendly and helpful.  I'd stay here again any time!

Summary Heading: First time staying here and loved it!!!!
Summary: This hotel is a gem among some of the others in the area. Stayed 3 nights in suite w/balcony. the suites are very roomy and clean. Had a small sofa and jetted tub! Also had a heated good size pool and hot tub! Very relaxing grounds even though it is next to a fairly busy road. Will for sure return to this property when in the area!!!!!

Wasn't sure about this place when we walked into the lobby but we were so tired we decided to take a chance and boy did we luck out. Room had been redone so recently, it still had that new carpet smell.  All appliances were new, new bathroom fixtures, tile, sinks, even nice granite countertops.  Seperate kitchen area with sink, micro, fridge, dining table and cabinets.   Only thing that wasn't new was the furniture but who cares. The most comfortable bed I have ever slept in, even nice sheets. I even took a pic of the mattress tag so I could buy one when I got home. Spotless, spotless, spotless.   Every employees was top notch nice. Even the continental breakfast was better than I expected. Actually had bacon. Otherwise, I never do those free crappy bkfsts. Not exactly a gourmet

Check-in and check-out was easy and fast. Staff was excellent. We had a room with balcony that overlooked the courtyard. Room was cozy except for a fowl odor coming from the bathroom sink. The bed pillows were uncomfortable and the sofa was very stiff as well as uncomfortable.

The Best Western is centrally located in San Clemente. We stayed here because we had a wedding to go to at the Casino. It is walking distance to that venue, which was really convenient  as a guest. The hotel is also walking distance from many restaurants and a quick drive or Uber ride away from downtown San Clemente.  The staff takes pride in the Best Western and everyone was helpful. The rooms were outdated but very clean. It is a noisy property but nothing that was outrageous. The breakfast buffet was much more inclusive then what I was expecting. They had hot breakfast items as well as cereal, pastries, yogurt etc. It was nice to start the day with eggs, fresh fruit and coffee.  The Best Western is a good value and a convenient place to stay if you are going to a wedding at

The staff was very enthusiastic about the hotel and the city. Would definitely stay here again. 1 minute drive from the outlets. Drive to the pier is no hassle. I chose this location based on the distance from the outlets, but ended up traveling around the city quite a bit. Thanks!

Loved the hotel,everything was just great...would stay again for sure.The staff was awesome,the room was very clean and comfy.The shower was great.Location was awesome.It was a great stay for the money.

Summary Heading: Great Place, All is Great Staying here
Summary: What a great hotel in North Beach, San Clemente, California. Clean, tidy, great desk staff people, great breakfast, plastic card keys for fast easy safe protected entries. Great beds, so comfortable. The room maids do a splendid job with nothing missed. I would definitely stay here again and intend for my family of three to stay here on their next visit. Close to restaurants, 1/4 mile for the big outlet stores and best of all very close to the excellent sandy beach...maybe only an 8 minute walk away. 7-11 is around the corner and wi-fi in the room. Give it a try...the locals all recommended it...

I really enjoyed my stay at Best Western Casablanca Inn....The complimentary hot breakfast was great...The rooms are spacious and very clean...And i loved having a jacuzzi to go into after a long day of walking...Within walking distance to downtown San Clemente which is beautiful...And the beds were extremely comfortable. And the nightly rate is extremely reasonable for all that you get....

Everything about this hotel ranked #1 for us!  The hotel staff went out of their way to make our stay a comfortable and enjoyable one.  The room was very quiet (NO noise from adjoining or upstairs rooms), comfortable and had modern upgrades.  The full breakfast that is provided each morning exceeded our expectations.  We had to leave our home for a few days for termite extermination.  We didn't want to leave when it was time to go back! :) This hotel  gets an A++ from my family!

This hotel was perfectly located, and very clean. We walked to the hotel from the Metrolink station. We walked 1 mile along the beach to the Pier. We walked up the street to a great Mexican dinner. The front office people were great! I would recommend staying there.

Dirty sheets at check in it was obvious that they didn't changed them, sofa was dirty and also stained and the carpet was very nasty. Went there with my wife for an Anniversary getaway and it was awful, will not come back to that hotel ever!!.

We checked in at 8:30 pm and had no problems except the jet lag and road weariness driving from LAX on a Friday nite. We had a king suite on the second floor with an ocean view. The room and bath were clean and good sized. The tub/shower was especially deep and a little hard to enter. The shower head was exceeding high. The flat screen TV worked well. The wifi was on all the time.There was no problem with the cleaning crew and there was no weird smells from the products they used.  The breakfast was the usual hotel offering but they kept it fresh and the  breakfast room was always clean. They do close the room at 9 and give you the eye if you linger.  We were visiting family and wanted more sit down time. The office gave us access to a board room and told us to lock up when we

Excellent pool facility and friendly staff. This hotel had a nice feel of a quality beach town hotel. Room was clean and comfortable with plenty of parking. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend this hotel.

We couldn't have been happier with our room, balcony view of the beautiful courtyard, and great service.  The beds were very comfortable, the staff so friendly and helpful, and our experience was delightful!  Thank you so much for making our stay in San Clemente a perfect holiday!

Summary Heading: Good value but not the nicest hotel
Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights while in town for business. The hotel was booked for me. Best Western isn't typically my first choice. That being said, if you book a Best Western you should expect to sacrifice some things because of the lower prices.  Here are some pros and cons that i experienced at this hotel.  PROS -free WiFi -free parking -close to the beach -free breakfast -large rooms -lots of channels available on the TV   CONS -outdoor entrances make the rooms very noisey if people are outside (i was woken up at 5:45am both mornings by people going to get early breakfast and kept awake at night because of people hanging out outside at the fountain) -hotel rooms are outdated and need updates -mini fridge in the room was buzzing very noisey and I had to unplug it

Good place to consider if visiting San Clemente. Decent breakfast, pool, fitness center, and rooms. Staff was friendly and helpful with questions. Internet and TV worked well.  Within walking distance of the beach and very close to the outlet mall.

Best staff ever. Every one of them. Front desk, breakfast attendant, more front desk help. The property is quiet and clean and easy to find. The Jacuzzi tub is the best ever. The room design is great.

Everyone at Best Western PLUS Casablanca Inn were very friendly and helpful. When I mentioned we would be going to the Casino for a wedding the desk clerk said, "let me draw you a map on how to get there, it's only a 5 minute walk." The staff in the breakfast room were very cheerful and helpful also.

Planned a last minute getaway and this hotel was an excellent choice. Very spacious rooms with all needed amenities.  Rooms were very clean and staff was very courteous and helpful. I recommend this hotel to anyone looking in this area.  Rates were excellent.

sheets were amazing. we stayed at another hotel the night before for the same price, and I was so grossed out about the other hotels place. I was nervous for what would be in store. But this place exceeded my expectations above and beyond for the price we got. would stay again, the location was great and the Ocean was a walk away.

Very nice stay, great location. Walking distance to a beautiful beach and walk path. Clean and the breakfast was good. Free parking and easy getting to the rooms. Staff was super nice. Great area to vacation!

Summary Heading: Quality Stay at a Reasonable Price
Summary: I booked last minute.  Was able to get a room at a reasonable price.  Parking is a bit... scarce.  Otherwise, no complaints.  Pleasant, quiet, clean, fast.    This hotel is right down the street from the new San Clemente Outlets which was the location of my business trip.  Very convenient.

This was our second time staying at Best Western Plus Casablanca Inn, San Clemente.  The hotel is clean and comfortable.  We really enjoy the closeness to the beach, just a few blocks to the north entrance of the beach trail. We did have a problem with the spa in our room.  Also, our room was at the top of the internal stairs.  One night some guests decided that outside our door was an excellent place to visit - at various times of the night - the last being 1:45 am.  We could hear them there and when they were in the parking lot below us.  Not much the hotel can do about loud guests.

This Boutiques Hotel is close to the beach, the freeway AND a brand new outlet mall!...It is located on the main drive into town...breakfast is included with your room every day!  Eric is the Nicest Manager ever! Also, great for Group travel!

There are not many places in the area that takes pets. So we are thankful they did. Our room was a handicap access so it wasn't the most comfortable. The worst was it was in the garage area. At first we thought this would be fine as it would be darker and easier to sleep. But unfortunately when someone is in the garage talking it goes straight into the room. And someone on their cell phone at 12:30am is not conducive to sleep. Breakfast was more than decent for the cost of the room. Parking is challenging and the spots they have are on the small side.

This hotel is a little hideaway.  It is very convenient to the beach and to San Clemente restaurants.  The staff is very efficient, courteous and helpful.  Strongly recommend this hotel.  The only issue is the tight parking lot.  I've never been disappointed staying here.

Summary Heading: Great Stay at Best Western Plus - Casablanca Inn
Summary: Clean, comfortable, good location, wonderful breakfast, a must stay place for the price. Hot tub is great and open until 10PM. Reliable internet. This was our first stay in San Clemente and the Best Western location was a good "home base" from which to explore the area while on vacation. Very close to the MetroLink so you can take the train to LA for a day trip.

Pleasant decor close to train, metro, beach, trail, downtown San Clemente and just a few miles from Dana Point and San Juan Capistrano.  Staff was available and helpful.  Full self service breakfast, nice pool, and outdoor patio area.  We have stayed here several times and, with recent upgrades, it is very nice!

Summary Heading: School of Infantry Graduation at Pendleton
Summary: Close to the Basilone Gate to enter for SOI Graduation at Camp Pendleton. Also, very close to the ocean and sight seeing in San Clemente. Very nice hotel, great service, clean, good full breakfast, free internet, good parking, very reasonably priced. Will stay here again in a heartbeat!

We were very impressed with this "GEM", located a couple of blocks from the Pacific Ocean,  We loved the amazingly helpful and courteous staff and enjoyed the Breakfasts which was very well prepared by a very sweet, courteous Server.  We also enjoyed the peaceful courtyard, we sat there after our Breakfasts and enjoyed watching the Humming Birds, they were also enjoying the solitude, with a beautiful Water Fountain and Magnificent, Beautiful Hibiscus Flowers.  We took pictures here and they are a great memory of our wonderful South California Vacation.

I had a 6 night stay and was very happy. This hotel was better than expected. The property was well maintained & compact. The room was clean & fresh smelling. The updates were fine & everything worked. I found the bed to be comfortable the fan/air conditioner worked well. The linen was in good conditions.  Basic in-room coffee maker. The staff was exceptionally helpful each & every day.   Breakfast was typical for a Best Western, hot items and cold along with plenty of fresh fruit. They kept everything replenished and had staff present to keep things clean & assist with the waffle maker.  There are some casual eateries within walking distance of the hotel. I was there for a workshop at the nearby Art supply store (a great place for supplies), and would stay here again when I'm

Summary Heading: Pleasant Stay, Helpful Staff (and the dogs enjoyed, too!)
Summary: We stayed here for a weekend get away. Things got off to a very good start with a welcoming and helpful staff member at the desk who quickly got us checked in, and provided helpful information. The room was clean and had a fridge which we made good use of. The proximity to North Beach and the coastal trail were great. My only quibble, a suggestion to management, Room 101's dresser and table in front of the couch are a bit scuffed and could use replacement. I also had good interaction with the front desk staff with a WiFi issue and at checkout. I missed breakfast but my wife was pleased with the selections. This property is Dog friendly and our dogs thoroughly enjoyed their visit. Some other things were nice as well. The property is close to the beach, but no boisterous groups

Not a bad place if you plan to be near the beach.  The rooms are nice and offer a lot for the money.  I stayed here because it was near my planned activity.  I would say that if you and or family need a place near the beach it would be a good find.

Summary Heading: Casblanca great value for the price in beautiful San Clemente
Summary: Clean, comfortable and affordable.  Pet friendly, but you wouldn't know it by the cleanliness of the rooms.  First time staying there and it was more than we expected.  Definitely recommend and we look forward to staying there again.

Very clean older place. Great free breakfast. Close to ocean and pier. Could use more parking but it is free. Very nice pool area and heated pool area. Friendly  staff. Comfortable  beds. Close to freeway but no noise.

Came down to visit my boyfriend. He left at 4:30 in the morning and I wanted to sleep in but could not. There was soo much noise coming from outside. I cant really blame the hotel as they cannot control traffic outside but lets just say try not to get a room by the street.

A+. I would stay again. The area is very quiet. and the beach area was amazing. weather was perfect. There is lots to do in the area . Plus they are developing the area north of the hotel in new houses and appartments.

The rooms were very nice. Also it was close to the beach.l loved everything about our room excellent. I know I will come back for sure. Also I would tell all my friends. My room was so cool. It had a couch,refrigerator and microwave.

We arrived late and had to leave early so I'm not able to say we enjoyed all of the amenities. We did spy the pool. It looked nice but at 8?am we had to roll.   The staff was friendly at check in. Breakfast was fine. Would have liked milk in a carton but no biggee.   The room we had was large and quiet. Parking was free.   We liked it. Close to everything.   Charming older motel.

After reading all these rave reviews, we were under-whelmed. Paid extra for a room w/balcony which overlooked the entry driveway :( That room had a leak in the bathroom. Next room was fair but not stocked well. Facility seemed old and run-down. All outdoor access to rooms (it's a motel, not hotel) Huge spider web around the outside door light - creepy! Sad thing is I was promised a $50 coupon for future use (due to having to change rooms) but never received it. They said they couldn't discount anything immediately because I booked through an online site (learned something new there).  The staff tried hard to please and be friendly. Location is good: 5-10 minute walk to beach, 20-30 minute walk to pier via beach or trail. Close drive to outlets. It's actually very far from
Manager Response: Dearr Guest, Let me first apologize that our staff did not send you the discount toward a future stay as promised.  I would encourage you to contact me personally so that I can make sure that is emailed/mailed to you promptly. Due to our oversight I would also be happy to upgrade you to our nicest rooms located in an interior hallway during your next visit with us.  Thank you very much for staying with us, and I look forward to connecting with you shortly.  Sincerely Eric M GM

Summary: Nice, older, Motel/Hotel close to the beach, rail stops and restaurants. Great value for the area, breakfast included. Friendly staff, rooms are clean and well cared for. Pets are allowed.  We would recommend this motel to friends.

This Best Western is at the top of my list.  I always stay at a Best Western & this is up there.  The staff was helpful.  The breakfast attend was GREAT.  She made it worth while to get up in the morning to get breakfast.

Summary Heading: Nice, clean and all about location
Summary: Nice, cute outside look for the hotel and it's all about location since is just a few blocks from Del Mar street where all the action is in San Clemente. Close to the new Outlet Mall and highways. Great area to stop before going to San Diego.

Great location.  Great rooms.  The staff was superb.  We enjoyed being able to walk to the beach and the pier.  There are restaurants close by.  The courtyard is a nice addition for eating breakfast.  Ana in the breakfast area is super amazing.

Great. the hotel is close to the beach. It's about 1/2 block away and the walking and running trail is right on the beach.  And particularly this time they served a full breakfast. the parking could be much better and renovation of the elevator but overall the review was satisfactory

Summary Heading: spacious rooms, clean, basic, just what you would expect
Summary: we booked this in advance for a great price, the bed was huge (queen). the pool was clean and quiet when we were in it, hot tub was clean but we didnt stay in it long . its a perfect place to stop between LA and san diego zoo. the receptionist was very helpful, she gave us advice on local places to eat.

Cute, comfortable, affordable hotel close to everything...food, train, shopping. We stayed at this property for a soccer tournament, and everything was just right for a successful weekend!  Everyone slept well, breakfast was good, and

I was visiting San Clemente with my family.  When we checked in the staff were very friendly and kind giving us advice etc  Our room was very clean and decorated lovely. That evening we went to the pool even though it was winter it was very warm and cleaned well. Breakfast in the morning was complimentary and was very good quality and had great selection. Me and my family really enjoyed our stay and would recommend anybody to visit! Also San Clemente is a very pretty place.

The hotel was fantastic value for money.  We had a king delux suite for our family of 5 which came had ample room for our very large family.  The bathroom and wardrobe was large and the spa bath was an added bonus.  All the staff were fantastic - definitely better than some of the high priced hotels we have wasted money on.

This was our first time staying at a Best Western in San Clemente.  It was a great location as we visited this area to surf.  Some great restaurants close by.  Clean, comfortable rooms at a great price.  Super friendly staff.

Neat & clean, excellent breakfast, friendly staff. Location was very convenient to the beach and just north of Del Mar the main drag in San Clemente CA. Upgraded breakfast room and updated fitness center.
